03562                 /* Check for unaligned bytes */
03563                 if ((length & 7) > 0) {
03564                         /* Setup to process unaligned bytes */
03565                         istart = length & 0xfffffff8;
03566                         cursrc1 = &Src1[istart];
03567                         curdest = &Dest[istart];
03568                 } else {
03569                         /* No unaligned bytes - we are done */
03570                         return (0);
03571                 }
03572         } else {
03573                 /* Setup to process whole image */
03574                 istart = 0;
03575                 cursrc1 = Src1;
03576                 curdest = Dest;
03577         }
03578 
03579         /* C routine to process image */
03580         for (i = istart; i < length; i++) {
03581                 result = (int) *cursrc1 << N;
03582                 if (result > 255)
03583                         result = 255;
03584                 *curdest = (unsigned char) result;
03585                 /* Advance pointers */
03586                 cursrc1++;
03587                 curdest++;
03588         }
03589 
03590         return (0);
03591 }
03592 
03603 int SDL_imageFilterBinarizeUsingThresholdMMX(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int SrcLength, unsigned char T)
03604 {
03605 #ifdef USE_MMX
03606 #if !defined(GCC__)
03607         __asm
03608         {
03609                 pusha
03610                         /* ** Duplicate T in 8 bytes of MM3 ** */
03611                         pcmpeqb mm1, mm1        /* generate all 1's in mm1 */
03612                         pcmpeqb mm2, mm2        /* generate all 1's in mm2 */
03613                         mov al, T       /* load T into AL */
03614                         mov ah, al      /* copy AL into AH */
03615                         mov bx, ax      /* copy AX into BX */
03616                         shl eax, 16     /* shift 2 bytes of EAX left */
03617                         mov ax, bx      /* copy BX into AX */
03618                         movd mm3, eax           /* copy EAX into MM3 */
03619                         movd mm4, eax           /* copy EAX into MM4 */
03620                         punpckldq mm3, mm4      /* fill higher bytes of MM3 with T */
03621                         psubusb mm2, mm3        /* store 0xFF - T in MM2 */
03622                         mov eax, Src1           /* load Src1 address into eax */
03623                         mov edi, Dest           /* load Dest address into edi */
03624                         mov ecx, SrcLength      /* load loop counter (SIZE) into ecx */
03625                         shr ecx, 3      /* counter/8 (MMX loads 8 bytes at a time) */
03626                         align 16                        /* 16 byte alignment of the loop entry */
03627 L1029:
03628                 movq mm0, [eax]         /* load 8 bytes from SrcDest into MM0 */
03629                 paddusb mm0, mm2        /* MM0=SrcDest+(0xFF-T) (add 8 bytes with saturation) */
03630                         pcmpeqb mm0, mm1        /* binarize 255:0, comparing to 255 */
03631                         movq [edi], mm0         /* store result in SrcDest */
03632                         add eax, 8      /* increase Src1 register pointer by 8 */
03633                         add edi, 8      /* increase Dest register pointer by 8 */
03634                         dec              ecx            /* decrease loop counter */
03635                         jnz             L1029           /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
03636                         emms                            /* exit MMX state */
03637                         popa
03638         }
03639 #else
03640         asm volatile
03641                 ("pusha              \n\t"
03642                 /* ** Duplicate T in 8 bytes of MM3 ** */
03643                 "pcmpeqb   %%mm1, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* generate all 1's in mm1 */
03644                 "pcmpeqb   %%mm2, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* generate all 1's in mm2 */
03645                 "mov           %3, %%al \n\t"   /* load T into AL */
03646                 "mov         %%al, %%ah \n\t"   /* copy AL into AH */
03647                 "mov         %%ax, %%bx \n\t"   /* copy AX into BX */
03648                 "shl         $16, %%eax \n\t"   /* shift 2 bytes of EAX left */
03649                 "mov         %%bx, %%ax \n\t"   /* copy BX into AX */
03650                 "movd      %%eax, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* copy EAX into MM3 */
03651                 "movd      %%eax, %%mm4 \n\t"   /* copy EAX into MM4 */
03652                 "punpckldq %%mm4, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* fill higher bytes of MM3 with T */
03653                 "psubusb   %%mm3, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* store 0xFF - T in MM2 */
03654                 "mov          %1, %%eax \n\t"   /* load Src1 address into eax */
03655                 "mov          %0, %%edi \n\t"   /* load Dest address into edi */
03656                 "mov          %2, %%ecx \n\t"   /* load loop counter (SIZE) into ecx */
03657                 "shr          $3, %%ecx \n\t"   /* counter/8 (MMX loads 8 bytes at a time) */
03658                 ".align 16              \n\t"   /* 16 byte alignment of the loop entry */
03659                 "1:                     \n\t" 
03660                 "movq    (%%eax), %%mm0 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes from SrcDest into MM0 */
03661                 "paddusb   %%mm2, %%mm0 \n\t"   /* MM0=SrcDest+(0xFF-T) (add 8 bytes with saturation) */
03662                 "pcmpeqb   %%mm1, %%mm0 \n\t"   /* binarize 255:0, comparing to 255 */
03663                 "movq    %%mm0, (%%edi) \n\t"   /* store result in SrcDest */
03664                 "add          $8, %%eax \n\t"   /* increase Src1 register pointer by 8 */
03665                 "add          $8, %%edi \n\t"   /* increase Dest register pointer by 8 */
03666                 "dec              %%ecx \n\t"   /* decrease loop counter */
03667                 "jnz                 1b \n\t"   /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
03668                 "emms                   \n\t"   /* exit MMX state */
03669                 "popa                   \n\t":"=m" (Dest)       /* %0 */
03670                 :"m"(Src1),             /* %1 */
03671                 "m"(SrcLength),         /* %2 */
03672                 "m"(T)                  /* %3 */
03673                 );
03674 #endif
03675         return (0);
03676 #else
03677         return (-1);
03678 #endif
03679 }
03680 
03691 int SDL_imageFilterBinarizeUsingThreshold(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int length, unsigned char T)
03692 {
03693         unsigned int i, istart;
03694         unsigned char *cursrc1;
03695         unsigned char *curdest;
03696 
03697         /* Validate input parameters */
03698         if ((Src1 == NULL) || (Dest == NULL))
03699                 return(-1);
03700         if (length == 0)
03701                 return(0);
03702 
03703         /* Special case: T==0 */
03704         if (T == 0) {
03705                 memset(Dest, 255, length);
03706                 return (0); 
03707         }
03708 
03709         if ((SDL_imageFilterMMXdetect()) && (length > 7)) {
03710 
03711                 SDL_imageFilterBinarizeUsingThresholdMMX(Src1, Dest, length, T);
03712 
03713                 /* Check for unaligned bytes */
03714                 if ((length & 7) > 0) {
03715                         /* Setup to process unaligned bytes */
03716                         istart = length & 0xfffffff8;
03717                         cursrc1 = &Src1[istart];
03718                         curdest = &Dest[istart];
03719                 } else {
03720                         /* No unaligned bytes - we are done */
03721                         return (0);
03722                 }
03723         } else {
03724                 /* Setup to process whole image */
03725                 istart = 0;
03726                 cursrc1 = Src1;
03727                 curdest = Dest;
03728         }
03729 
03730         /* C routine to process image */
03731         for (i = istart; i < length; i++) {
03732                 *curdest = (unsigned char)(((unsigned char)*cursrc1 >= T) ? 255 : 0);
03733                 /* Advance pointers */
03734                 cursrc1++;
03735                 curdest++;
03736         }
03737 
03738         return (0);
03739 }
03740 
03752 int SDL_imageFilterClipToRangeMMX(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int SrcLength, unsigned char Tmin,
03753                                                                   unsigned char Tmax)
03754 {
03755 #ifdef USE_MMX
03756 #if !defined(GCC__)
03757         __asm
03758         {
03759                 pusha
03760                         pcmpeqb mm1, mm1        /* generate all 1's in mm1 */
03761                         /* ** Duplicate Tmax in 8 bytes of MM3 ** */
03762                         mov al, Tmax    /* load Tmax into AL */
03763                         mov ah, al      /* copy AL into AH */
03764                         mov bx, ax      /* copy AX into BX */
03765                         shl eax, 16     /* shift 2 bytes of EAX left */
03766                         mov ax, bx      /* copy BX into AX */
03767                         movd mm3, eax           /* copy EAX into MM3 */
03768                         movd mm4, eax           /* copy EAX into MM4 */
03769                         punpckldq mm3, mm4      /* fill higher bytes of MM3 with Tmax */
03770                         psubusb mm1, mm3        /* store 0xFF - Tmax in MM1 */
03771                         /* ** Duplicate Tmin in 8 bytes of MM5 ** */
03772                         mov al, Tmin    /* load Tmin into AL */
03773                         mov ah, al      /* copy AL into AH */
03774                         mov bx, ax      /* copy AX into BX */
03775                         shl eax, 16     /* shift 2 bytes of EAX left */
03776                         mov ax, bx      /* copy BX into AX */
03777                         movd mm5, eax           /* copy EAX into MM5 */
03778                         movd mm4, eax           /* copy EAX into MM4 */
03779                         punpckldq mm5, mm4      /* fill higher bytes of MM5 with Tmin */
03780                         movq mm7, mm5           /* copy MM5 into MM7 */
03781                         paddusb mm7, mm1        /* store 0xFF - Tmax + Tmin in MM7 */
03782                         mov eax, Src1           /* load Src1 address into eax */
03783                         mov edi, Dest           /* load Dest address into edi */
03784                         mov ecx, SrcLength      /* load loop counter (SIZE) into ecx */
03785                         shr ecx, 3      /* counter/8 (MMX loads 8 bytes at a time) */
03786                         align 16                        /* 16 byte alignment of the loop entry */
03787 L1030:
03788                 movq mm0, [eax]         /* load 8 bytes from Src1 into MM0 */
03789                 paddusb mm0, mm1        /* MM0=SrcDest+(0xFF-Tmax) */
03790                         psubusb mm0, mm7        /* MM0=MM0-(0xFF-Tmax+Tmin) */
03791                         paddusb mm0, mm5        /* MM0=MM0+Tmin */
03792                         movq [edi], mm0         /* store result in Dest */
03793                         add eax, 8      /* increase Src1 register pointer by 8 */
03794                         add edi, 8      /* increase Dest register pointer by 8 */
03795                         dec              ecx            /* decrease loop counter */
03796                         jnz             L1030           /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
03797                         emms                            /* exit MMX state */
03798                         popa
03799         }
03800 #else
03801         asm volatile
03802                 ("pusha              \n\t" "pcmpeqb   %%mm1, %%mm1 \n\t"        /* generate all 1's in mm1 */
03803                 /* ** Duplicate Tmax in 8 bytes of MM3 ** */
03804                 "mov           %4, %%al \n\t"   /* load Tmax into AL */
03805                 "mov         %%al, %%ah \n\t"   /* copy AL into AH */
03806                 "mov         %%ax, %%bx \n\t"   /* copy AX into BX */
03807                 "shl         $16, %%eax \n\t"   /* shift 2 bytes of EAX left */
03808                 "mov         %%bx, %%ax \n\t"   /* copy BX into AX */
03809                 "movd      %%eax, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* copy EAX into MM3 */
03810                 "movd      %%eax, %%mm4 \n\t"   /* copy EAX into MM4 */
03811                 "punpckldq %%mm4, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* fill higher bytes of MM3 with Tmax */
03812                 "psubusb   %%mm3, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* store 0xFF - Tmax in MM1 */
03813                 /* ** Duplicate Tmin in 8 bytes of MM5 ** */
03814                 "mov           %3, %%al \n\t"   /* load Tmin into AL */
03815                 "mov         %%al, %%ah \n\t"   /* copy AL into AH */
03816                 "mov         %%ax, %%bx \n\t"   /* copy AX into BX */
03817                 "shl         $16, %%eax \n\t"   /* shift 2 bytes of EAX left */
03818                 "mov         %%bx, %%ax \n\t"   /* copy BX into AX */
03819                 "movd      %%eax, %%mm5 \n\t"   /* copy EAX into MM5 */
03820                 "movd      %%eax, %%mm4 \n\t"   /* copy EAX into MM4 */
03821                 "punpckldq %%mm4, %%mm5 \n\t"   /* fill higher bytes of MM5 with Tmin */
03822                 "movq      %%mm5, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* copy MM5 into MM7 */
03823                 "paddusb   %%mm1, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* store 0xFF - Tmax + Tmin in MM7 */
03824                 "mov          %1, %%eax \n\t"   /* load Src1 address into eax */
03825                 "mov          %0, %%edi \n\t"   /* load Dest address into edi */
03826                 "mov          %2, %%ecx \n\t"   /* load loop counter (SIZE) into ecx */
03827                 "shr          $3, %%ecx \n\t"   /* counter/8 (MMX loads 8 bytes at a time) */
03828                 ".align 16              \n\t"   /* 16 byte alignment of the loop entry */
03829                 "1:                     \n\t" 
03830                 "movq    (%%eax), %%mm0 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes from Src1 into MM0 */
03831                 "paddusb   %%mm1, %%mm0 \n\t"   /* MM0=SrcDest+(0xFF-Tmax) */
03832                 "psubusb   %%mm7, %%mm0 \n\t"   /* MM0=MM0-(0xFF-Tmax+Tmin) */
03833                 "paddusb   %%mm5, %%mm0 \n\t"   /* MM0=MM0+Tmin */
03834                 "movq    %%mm0, (%%edi) \n\t"   /* store result in Dest */
03835                 "add          $8, %%eax \n\t"   /* increase Src1 register pointer by 8 */
03836                 "add          $8, %%edi \n\t"   /* increase Dest register pointer by 8 */
03837                 "dec              %%ecx \n\t"   /* decrease loop counter */
03838                 "jnz                 1b \n\t"   /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
03839                 "emms                   \n\t"   /* exit MMX state */
03840                 "popa                   \n\t":"=m" (Dest)       /* %0 */
03841                 :"m"(Src1),             /* %1 */
03842                 "m"(SrcLength),         /* %2 */
03843                 "m"(Tmin),              /* %3 */
03844                 "m"(Tmax)                       /* %4 */
03845                 );
03846 #endif
03847         return (0);
03848 #else
03849         return (-1);
03850 #endif
03851 }
03852 
03864 int SDL_imageFilterClipToRange(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int length, unsigned char Tmin,
03865                                                            unsigned char Tmax)
03866 {
03867         unsigned int i, istart;
03868         unsigned char *cursrc1;
03869         unsigned char *curdest;
03870 
03871         /* Validate input parameters */
03872         if ((Src1 == NULL) || (Dest == NULL))
03873                 return(-1);
03874         if (length == 0)
03875                 return(0);
03876 
03877         /* Special case: Tmin==0 && Tmax = 255 */
03878         if ((Tmin == 0) && (Tmax == 25)) {
03879                 memcpy(Src1, Dest, length);
03880                 return (0); 
03881         }
03882 
03883         if ((SDL_imageFilterMMXdetect()) && (length > 7)) {
03884 
03885                 SDL_imageFilterClipToRangeMMX(Src1, Dest, length, Tmin, Tmax);
03886 
03887                 /* Check for unaligned bytes */
03888                 if ((length & 7) > 0) {
03889                         /* Setup to process unaligned bytes */
03890                         istart = length & 0xfffffff8;
03891                         cursrc1 = &Src1[istart];
03892                         curdest = &Dest[istart];
03893                 } else {
03894                         /* No unaligned bytes - we are done */
03895                         return (0);
03896                 }
03897         } else {
03898                 /* Setup to process whole image */
03899                 istart = 0;
03900                 cursrc1 = Src1;
03901                 curdest = Dest;
03902         }
03903 
03904         /* C routine to process image */
03905         for (i = istart; i < length; i++) {
03906                 if (*cursrc1 < Tmin) {
03907                         *curdest = Tmin;
03908                 } else if (*cursrc1 > Tmax) {
03909                         *curdest = Tmax;
03910                 } else {
03911                         *curdest = *cursrc1;
03912                 }
03913                 /* Advance pointers */
03914                 cursrc1++;
03915                 curdest++;
03916         }
03917 
03918         return (0);
03919 }
03920 
03934 int SDL_imageFilterNormalizeLinearMMX(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int SrcLength, int Cmin, int Cmax,
03935                                                                           int Nmin, int Nmax)
03936 {
03937 #ifdef USE_MMX
03938 #if !defined(GCC__)
03939         __asm
03940         {
03941                 pusha
03942                         mov ax, WORD PTR Nmax           /* load Nmax in AX */
03943                         mov bx, WORD PTR Cmax           /* load Cmax in BX */
03944                         sub ax, WORD PTR Nmin           /* AX = Nmax - Nmin */
03945                         sub bx, WORD PTR Cmin           /* BX = Cmax - Cmin */
03946                         jz             L10311           /* check division by zero */
03947                         xor dx, dx      /* prepare for division, zero DX */
03948                         div               bx            /* AX = AX/BX */
03949                         jmp            L10312
03950 L10311:
03951                 mov ax, 255     /* if div by zero, assume result max byte value */
03952 L10312:                         /* ** Duplicate AX in 4 words of MM0 ** */
03953                 mov bx, ax      /* copy AX into BX */
03954                         shl eax, 16     /* shift 2 bytes of EAX left */
03955                         mov ax, bx      /* copy BX into AX */
03956                         movd mm0, eax           /* copy EAX into MM0 */
03957                         movd mm1, eax           /* copy EAX into MM1 */
03958                         punpckldq mm0, mm1      /* fill higher words of MM0 with AX */
03959                         /* ** Duplicate Cmin in 4 words of MM1 ** */
03960                         mov ax, WORD PTR Cmin           /* load Cmin into AX */
03961                         mov bx, ax      /* copy AX into BX */
03962                         shl eax, 16     /* shift 2 bytes of EAX left */
03963                         mov ax, bx      /* copy BX into AX */
03964                         movd mm1, eax           /* copy EAX into MM1 */
03965                         movd mm2, eax           /* copy EAX into MM2 */
03966                         punpckldq mm1, mm2      /* fill higher words of MM1 with Cmin */
03967                         /* ** Duplicate Nmin in 4 words of MM2 ** */
03968                         mov ax, WORD PTR Nmin           /* load Nmin into AX */
03969                         mov bx, ax      /* copy AX into BX */
03970                         shl eax, 16     /* shift 2 bytes of EAX left */
03971                         mov ax, bx      /* copy BX into AX */
03972                         movd mm2, eax           /* copy EAX into MM2 */
03973                         movd mm3, eax           /* copy EAX into MM3 */
03974                         punpckldq mm2, mm3      /* fill higher words of MM2 with Nmin */
03975                         pxor mm7, mm7           /* zero MM7 register */
03976                         mov eax, Src1           /* load Src1 address into eax */
03977                         mov edi, Dest           /* load Dest address into edi */
03978                         mov ecx, SrcLength      /* load loop counter (SIZE) into ecx */
03979                         shr ecx, 3      /* counter/8 (MMX loads 8 bytes at a time) */
03980                         align 16                        /* 16 byte alignment of the loop entry */
03981 L1031:
03982                 movq mm3, [eax]         /* load 8 bytes from Src1 into MM3 */
03983                 movq mm4, mm3           /* copy MM3 into MM4  */
03984                         punpcklbw mm3, mm7      /* unpack low  bytes of SrcDest into words */
03985                         punpckhbw mm4, mm7      /* unpack high bytes of SrcDest into words */
03986                         psubusb mm3, mm1        /* S-Cmin, low  bytes */
03987                         psubusb mm4, mm1        /* S-Cmin, high bytes */
03988                         pmullw mm3, mm0         /* MM0*(S-Cmin), low  bytes */
03989                         pmullw mm4, mm0         /* MM0*(S-Cmin), high bytes */
03990                         paddusb mm3, mm2        /* MM0*(S-Cmin)+Nmin, low  bytes */
03991                         paddusb mm4, mm2        /* MM0*(S-Cmin)+Nmin, high bytes */
03992                         /* ** Take abs value of the signed words ** */
03993                         movq mm5, mm3           /* copy mm3 into mm5 */
03994                         movq mm6, mm4           /* copy mm4 into mm6 */
03995                         psraw mm5, 15           /* fill mm5 words with word sign bit */
03996                         psraw mm6, 15           /* fill mm6 words with word sign bit */
03997                         pxor mm3, mm5           /* take 1's compliment of only neg words */
03998                         pxor mm4, mm6           /* take 1's compliment of only neg words */
03999                         psubsw mm3, mm5         /* add 1 to only neg words, W-(-1) or W-0 */
04000                         psubsw mm4, mm6         /* add 1 to only neg words, W-(-1) or W-0 */
04001                         packuswb mm3, mm4       /* pack words back into bytes with saturation */
04002                         movq [edi], mm3         /* store result in Dest */
04003                         add eax, 8      /* increase Src1 register pointer by 8 */
04004                         add edi, 8      /* increase Dest register pointer by 8 */
04005                         dec              ecx            /* decrease loop counter */
04006                         jnz             L1031           /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
04007                         emms                            /* exit MMX state */
04008                         popa
04009         }
04010 #else
04011         asm volatile
04012                 ("pusha              \n\t" "mov           %6, %%ax \n\t"        /* load Nmax in AX */
04013                 "mov           %4, %%bx \n\t"   /* load Cmax in BX */
04014                 "sub           %5, %%ax \n\t"   /* AX = Nmax - Nmin */
04015                 "sub           %3, %%bx \n\t"   /* BX = Cmax - Cmin */
04016                 "jz                  1f \n\t"   /* check division by zero */
04017                 "xor         %%dx, %%dx \n\t"   /* prepare for division, zero DX */
04018                 "div               %%bx \n\t"   /* AX = AX/BX */
04019                 "jmp                 2f \n\t" "1:                     \n\t" "mov         $255, %%ax \n\t"       /* if div by zero, assume result max. byte value */
04020                 "2:                    \n\t"    /* ** Duplicate AX in 4 words of MM0 ** */
04021                 "mov         %%ax, %%bx \n\t"   /* copy AX into BX */
04022                 "shl         $16, %%eax \n\t"   /* shift 2 bytes of EAX left */
04023                 "mov         %%bx, %%ax \n\t"   /* copy BX into AX */
04024                 "movd      %%eax, %%mm0 \n\t"   /* copy EAX into MM0 */
04025                 "movd      %%eax, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* copy EAX into MM1 */
04026                 "punpckldq %%mm1, %%mm0 \n\t"   /* fill higher words of MM0 with AX */
04027                 /* ** Duplicate Cmin in 4 words of MM1 ** */
04028                 "mov           %3, %%ax \n\t"   /* load Cmin into AX */
04029                 "mov         %%ax, %%bx \n\t"   /* copy AX into BX */
04030                 "shl         $16, %%eax \n\t"   /* shift 2 bytes of EAX left */
04031                 "mov         %%bx, %%ax \n\t"   /* copy BX into AX */
04032                 "movd      %%eax, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* copy EAX into MM1 */
04033                 "movd      %%eax, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy EAX into MM2 */
04034                 "punpckldq %%mm2, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* fill higher words of MM1 with Cmin */
04035                 /* ** Duplicate Nmin in 4 words of MM2 ** */
04036                 "mov           %5, %%ax \n\t"   /* load Nmin into AX */
04037                 "mov         %%ax, %%bx \n\t"   /* copy AX into BX */
04038                 "shl         $16, %%eax \n\t"   /* shift 2 bytes of EAX left */
04039                 "mov         %%bx, %%ax \n\t"   /* copy BX into AX */
04040                 "movd      %%eax, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy EAX into MM2 */
04041                 "movd      %%eax, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* copy EAX into MM3 */
04042                 "punpckldq %%mm3, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* fill higher words of MM2 with Nmin */
04043                 "pxor      %%mm7, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* zero MM7 register */
04044                 "mov          %1, %%eax \n\t"   /* load Src1 address into eax */
04045                 "mov          %0, %%edi \n\t"   /* load Dest address into edi */
04046                 "mov          %2, %%ecx \n\t"   /* load loop counter (SIZE) into ecx */
04047                 "shr          $3, %%ecx \n\t"   /* counter/8 (MMX loads 8 bytes at a time) */
04048                 ".align 16              \n\t"   /* 16 byte alignment of the loop entry */
04049                 "1:                     \n\t" 
04050                 "movq    (%%eax), %%mm3 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes from Src1 into MM3 */
04051                 "movq      %%mm3, %%mm4 \n\t"   /* copy MM3 into MM4  */
04052                 "punpcklbw %%mm7, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* unpack low  bytes of SrcDest into words */
04053                 "punpckhbw %%mm7, %%mm4 \n\t"   /* unpack high bytes of SrcDest into words */
04054                 "psubusb   %%mm1, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* S-Cmin, low  bytes */
04055                 "psubusb   %%mm1, %%mm4 \n\t"   /* S-Cmin, high bytes */
04056                 "pmullw    %%mm0, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* MM0*(S-Cmin), low  bytes */
04057                 "pmullw    %%mm0, %%mm4 \n\t"   /* MM0*(S-Cmin), high bytes */
04058                 "paddusb   %%mm2, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* MM0*(S-Cmin)+Nmin, low  bytes */
04059                 "paddusb   %%mm2, %%mm4 \n\t"   /* MM0*(S-Cmin)+Nmin, high bytes */
04060                 /* ** Take abs value of the signed words ** */
04061                 "movq      %%mm3, %%mm5 \n\t"   /* copy mm3 into mm5 */
04062                 "movq      %%mm4, %%mm6 \n\t"   /* copy mm4 into mm6 */
04063                 "psraw       $15, %%mm5 \n\t"   /* fill mm5 words with word sign bit */
04064                 "psraw       $15, %%mm6 \n\t"   /* fill mm6 words with word sign bit */
04065                 "pxor      %%mm5, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* take 1's compliment of only neg. words */
04066                 "pxor      %%mm6, %%mm4 \n\t"   /* take 1's compliment of only neg. words */
04067                 "psubsw    %%mm5, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* add 1 to only neg. words, W-(-1) or W-0 */
04068                 "psubsw    %%mm6, %%mm4 \n\t"   /* add 1 to only neg. words, W-(-1) or W-0 */
04069                 "packuswb  %%mm4, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* pack words back into bytes with saturation */
04070                 "movq    %%mm3, (%%edi) \n\t"   /* store result in Dest */
04071                 "add          $8, %%eax \n\t"   /* increase Src1 register pointer by 8 */
04072                 "add          $8, %%edi \n\t"   /* increase Dest register pointer by 8 */
04073                 "dec              %%ecx \n\t"   /* decrease loop counter */
04074                 "jnz                 1b \n\t"   /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
04075                 "emms                   \n\t"   /* exit MMX state */
04076                 "popa                   \n\t":"=m" (Dest)       /* %0 */
04077                 :"m"(Src1),             /* %1 */
04078                 "m"(SrcLength),         /* %2 */
04079                 "m"(Cmin),              /* %3 */
04080                 "m"(Cmax),              /* %4 */
04081                 "m"(Nmin),              /* %5 */
04082                 "m"(Nmax)                       /* %6 */
04083                 );
04084 #endif
04085         return (0);
04086 #else
04087         return (-1);
04088 #endif
04089 }
04090 
04104 int SDL_imageFilterNormalizeLinear(unsigned char *Src, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int length, int Cmin, int Cmax, int Nmin,
04105                                                                    int Nmax)
04106 {
04107         unsigned int i, istart;
04108         unsigned char *cursrc;
04109         unsigned char *curdest;
04110         int dN, dC, factor;
04111         int result;
04112 
04113         /* Validate input parameters */
04114         if ((Src == NULL) || (Dest == NULL))
04115                 return(-1);
04116         if (length == 0)
04117                 return(0);
04118 
04119         if ((SDL_imageFilterMMXdetect()) && (length > 7)) {
04120 
04121                 SDL_imageFilterNormalizeLinearMMX(Src, Dest, length, Cmin, Cmax, Nmin, Nmax);
04122 
04123                 /* Check for unaligned bytes */
04124                 if ((length & 7) > 0) {
04125                         /* Setup to process unaligned bytes */
04126                         istart = length & 0xfffffff8;
04127                         cursrc = &Src[istart];
04128                         curdest = &Dest[istart];
04129                 } else {
04130                         /* No unaligned bytes - we are done */
04131                         return (0);
04132                 }
04133         } else {
04134                 /* Setup to process whole image */
04135                 istart = 0;
04136                 cursrc = Src;
04137                 curdest = Dest;
04138         }
04139 
04140         /* C routine to process image */
04141         dC = Cmax - Cmin;
04142         if (dC == 0)
04143                 return (0);
04144         dN = Nmax - Nmin;
04145         factor = dN / dC;
04146         for (i = istart; i < length; i++) {
04147                 result = factor * ((int) (*cursrc) - Cmin) + Nmin;
04148                 if (result > 255)
04149                         result = 255;
04150                 *curdest = (unsigned char) result;
04151                 /* Advance pointers */
04152                 cursrc++;
04153                 curdest++;
04154         }
04155 
04156         return (0);
04157 }
04158 
04159 /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
04160 
04175 int SDL_imageFilterConvolveKernel3x3Divide(unsigned char *Src, unsigned char *Dest, int rows, int columns,
04176                                                                                    signed short *Kernel, unsigned char Divisor)
04177 {
04178         /* Validate input parameters */
04179         if ((Src == NULL) || (Dest == NULL) || (Kernel == NULL))
04180                 return(-1);
04181 
04182         if ((columns < 3) || (rows < 3) || (Divisor == 0))
04183                 return (-1);
04184 
04185         if ((SDL_imageFilterMMXdetect())) {
04186 #ifdef USE_MMX
04187 #if !defined(GCC__)
04188                 __asm
04189                 {
04190                         pusha
04191                                 pxor mm0, mm0           /* zero MM0 */
04192                                 xor ebx, ebx    /* zero EBX */
04193                                 mov bl, Divisor         /* load Divisor into BL */
04194                                 mov edx, Kernel         /* load Kernel address into EDX */
04195                                 movq mm5, [edx]         /* MM5 = {0,K2,K1,K0} */
04196                         add edx, 8      /* second row              |K0 K1 K2 0| */
04197                                 movq mm6, [edx]         /* MM6 = {0,K5,K4,K3}  K = |K3 K4 K5 0| */
04198                         add edx, 8      /* third row               |K6 K7 K8 0| */
04199                                 movq mm7, [edx]         /* MM7 = {0,K8,K7,K6} */
04200                         /* ---, */
04201                         mov eax, columns        /* load columns into EAX */
04202                                 mov esi, Src    /* ESI = Src row 0 address */
04203                                 mov edi, Dest           /* load Dest address to EDI */
04204                                 add edi, eax    /* EDI = EDI + columns */
04205                                 inc              edi            /* 1 byte offset from the left edge */
04206                                 mov edx, rows           /* initialize ROWS counter */
04207                                 sub edx, 2      /* do not use first and last row */
04208                                 /* ---, */
04209 L10320:
04210                         mov ecx, eax    /* initialize COLUMS counter */
04211                                 sub ecx, 2      /* do not use first and last column */
04212                                 align 16                        /* 16 byte alignment of the loop entry */
04213 L10322:
04214                         /* ---, */
04215                         movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the image first row */
04216                         add esi, eax    /* move one row below */
04217                                 movq mm2, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the image second row */
04218                         add esi, eax    /* move one row below */
04219                                 movq mm3, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the image third row */
04220                         punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first 4 bytes into words */
04221                                 punpcklbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack first 4 bytes into words */
04222                                 punpcklbw mm3, mm0      /* unpack first 4 bytes into words */
04223                                 pmullw mm1, mm5         /* multiply words first row  image*Kernel */
04224                                 pmullw mm2, mm6         /* multiply words second row image*Kernel */
04225                                 pmullw mm3, mm7         /* multiply words third row  image*Kernel */
04226                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the first and second rows */
04227                                 paddsw mm1, mm3         /* add 4 words of the third row and result */
04228                                 movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
04229                                 psrlq mm1, 32           /* shift 2 left words to the right */
04230                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 2 left and 2 right result words */
04231                                 movq mm3, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM3 */
04232                                 psrlq mm1, 16           /* shift 1 left word to the right */
04233                                 paddsw mm1, mm3         /* add 1 left and 1 right result words */
04234                                 /* --, */
04235                                 movd mm2, eax           /* save EAX in MM2 */
04236                                 movd mm3, edx           /* save EDX in MM3 */
04237                                 movd eax, mm1           /* copy MM1 into EAX */
04238                                 psraw mm1, 15           /* spread sign bit of the result */
04239                                 movd edx, mm1           /* fill EDX with a sign bit */
04240                                 idiv bx         /* IDIV - VERY EXPENSIVE */
04241                                 movd mm1, eax           /* move result of division into MM1 */
04242                                 packuswb mm1, mm0       /* pack division result with saturation */
04243                                 movd eax, mm1           /* copy saturated result into EAX */
04244                                 mov [edi], al           /* copy a byte result into Dest */
04245                                 movd edx, mm3           /* restore saved EDX */
04246                                 movd eax, mm2           /* restore saved EAX */
04247                                 /* --, */
04248                                 sub esi, eax    /* move two rows up */
04249                                 sub esi, eax    /* */
04250                                 inc              esi            /* move Src  pointer to the next pixel */
04251                                 inc              edi            /* move Dest pointer to the next pixel */
04252                                 /* ---, */
04253                                 dec              ecx            /* decrease loop counter COLUMNS */
04254                                 jnz            L10322           /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
04255                                 add esi, 2      /* move to the next row in Src */
04256                                 add edi, 2      /* move to the next row in Dest */
04257                                 dec              edx            /* decrease loop counter ROWS */
04258                                 jnz            L10320           /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
04259                                 /* ---, */
04260                                 emms                            /* exit MMX state */
04261                                 popa
04262                 }
04263 #else
04264                 asm volatile
04265                         ("pusha              \n\t" "pxor      %%mm0, %%mm0 \n\t"        /* zero MM0 */
04266                         "xor       %%ebx, %%ebx \n\t"   /* zero EBX */
04267                         "mov           %5, %%bl \n\t"   /* load Divisor into BL */
04268                         "mov          %4, %%edx \n\t"   /* load Kernel address into EDX */
04269                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm5 \n\t"   /* MM5 = {0,K2,K1,K0} */
04270                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* second row              |K0 K1 K2 0| */
04271                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm6 \n\t"   /* MM6 = {0,K5,K4,K3}  K = |K3 K4 K5 0| */
04272                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* third row               |K6 K7 K8 0| */
04273                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm7 \n\t"   /* MM7 = {0,K8,K7,K6} */
04274                         /* --- */
04275                         "mov          %3, %%eax \n\t"   /* load columns into EAX */
04276                         "mov          %1, %%esi \n\t"   /* ESI = Src row 0 address */
04277                         "mov          %0, %%edi \n\t"   /* load Dest address to EDI */
04278                         "add       %%eax, %%edi \n\t"   /* EDI = EDI + columns */
04279                         "inc              %%edi \n\t"   /* 1 byte offset from the left edge */
04280                         "mov          %2, %%edx \n\t"   /* initialize ROWS counter */
04281                         "sub          $2, %%edx \n\t"   /* do not use first and last row */
04282                         /* --- */
04283                         ".L10320:               \n\t" "mov       %%eax, %%ecx \n\t"     /* initialize COLUMS counter */
04284                         "sub          $2, %%ecx \n\t"   /* do not use first and last column */
04285                         ".align 16              \n\t"   /* 16 byte alignment of the loop entry */
04286                         ".L10322:               \n\t"
04287                         /* --- */
04288                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm1 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes of the image first row */
04289                         "add       %%eax, %%esi \n\t"   /* move one row below */
04290                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm2 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes of the image second row */
04291                         "add       %%eax, %%esi \n\t"   /* move one row below */
04292                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm3 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes of the image third row */
04293                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* unpack first 4 bytes into words */
04294                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* unpack first 4 bytes into words */
04295                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* unpack first 4 bytes into words */
04296                         "pmullw    %%mm5, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* multiply words first row  image*Kernel */
04297                         "pmullw    %%mm6, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* multiply words second row image*Kernel */
04298                         "pmullw    %%mm7, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* multiply words third row  image*Kernel */
04299                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* add 4 words of the first and second rows */
04300                         "paddsw    %%mm3, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* add 4 words of the third row and result */
04301                         "movq      %%mm1, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
04302                         "psrlq       $32, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* shift 2 left words to the right */
04303                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* add 2 left and 2 right result words */
04304                         "movq      %%mm1, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* copy MM1 into MM3 */
04305                         "psrlq       $16, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* shift 1 left word to the right */
04306                         "paddsw    %%mm3, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* add 1 left and 1 right result words */
04307                         /* -- */
04308                         "movd      %%eax, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* save EAX in MM2 */
04309                         "movd      %%edx, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* save EDX in MM3 */
04310                         "movd      %%mm1, %%eax \n\t"   /* copy MM1 into EAX */
04311                         "psraw       $15, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* spread sign bit of the result */
04312                         "movd      %%mm1, %%edx \n\t"   /* fill EDX with a sign bit */
04313                         "idivw             %%bx \n\t"   /* IDIV - VERY EXPENSIVE */
04314                         "movd      %%eax, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* move result of division into MM1 */
04315                         "packuswb  %%mm0, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* pack division result with saturation */
04316                         "movd      %%mm1, %%eax \n\t"   /* copy saturated result into EAX */
04317                         "mov      %%al, (%%edi) \n\t"   /* copy a byte result into Dest */
04318                         "movd      %%mm3, %%edx \n\t"   /* restore saved EDX */
04319                         "movd      %%mm2, %%eax \n\t"   /* restore saved EAX */
04320                         /* -- */
04321                         "sub       %%eax, %%esi \n\t"   /* move two rows up */
04322                         "sub       %%eax, %%esi \n\t"   /* */
04323                         "inc              %%esi \n\t"   /* move Src  pointer to the next pixel */
04324                         "inc              %%edi \n\t"   /* move Dest pointer to the next pixel */
04325                         /* --- */
04326                         "dec              %%ecx \n\t"   /* decrease loop counter COLUMNS */
04327                         "jnz            .L10322 \n\t"   /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
04328                         "add          $2, %%esi \n\t"   /* move to the next row in Src */
04329                         "add          $2, %%edi \n\t"   /* move to the next row in Dest */
04330                         "dec              %%edx \n\t"   /* decrease loop counter ROWS */
04331                         "jnz            .L10320 \n\t"   /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
04332                         /* --- */
04333                         "emms                   \n\t"   /* exit MMX state */
04334                         "popa                   \n\t":"=m" (Dest)       /* %0 */
04335                         :"m"(Src),              /* %1 */
04336                         "m"(rows),              /* %2 */
04337                         "m"(columns),           /* %3 */
04338                         "m"(Kernel),            /* %4 */
04339                         "m"(Divisor)            /* %5 */
04340                         );
04341 #endif
04342 #endif
04343                 return (0);
04344         } else {
04345                 /* No non-MMX implementation yet */
04346                 return (-1);
04347         }
04348 }
04349 
04364 int SDL_imageFilterConvolveKernel5x5Divide(unsigned char *Src, unsigned char *Dest, int rows, int columns,
04365                                                                                    signed short *Kernel, unsigned char Divisor)
04366 {
04367         /* Validate input parameters */
04368         if ((Src == NULL) || (Dest == NULL) || (Kernel == NULL))
04369                 return(-1);
04370 
04371         if ((columns < 5) || (rows < 5) || (Divisor == 0))
04372                 return (-1);
04373 
04374         if ((SDL_imageFilterMMXdetect())) {
04375 #ifdef USE_MMX
04376 #if !defined(GCC__)
04377                 __asm
04378                 {
04379                         pusha
04380                                 pxor mm0, mm0           /* zero MM0 */
04381                                 xor ebx, ebx    /* zero EBX */
04382                                 mov bl, Divisor         /* load Divisor into BL */
04383                                 movd mm5, ebx           /* copy Divisor into MM5 */
04384                                 mov edx, Kernel         /* load Kernel address into EDX */
04385                                 mov esi, Src    /* load Src  address to ESI */
04386                                 mov edi, Dest           /* load Dest address to EDI */
04387                                 add edi, 2      /* 2 column offset from the left edge */
04388                                 mov eax, columns        /* load columns into EAX */
04389                                 shl eax, 1      /* EAX = columns * 2 */
04390                                 add edi, eax    /* 2 row offset from the top edge */
04391                                 shr eax, 1      /* EAX = columns */
04392                                 mov ebx, rows           /* initialize ROWS counter */
04393                                 sub ebx, 4      /* do not use first 2 and last 2 rows */
04394                                 /* ---, */
04395 L10330:
04396                         mov ecx, eax    /* initialize COLUMNS counter */
04397                                 sub ecx, 4      /* do not use first 2 and last 2 columns */
04398                                 align 16                        /* 16 byte alignment of the loop entry */
04399 L10332:
04400                         pxor mm7, mm7           /* zero MM7 (accumulator) */
04401                                 movd mm6, esi           /* save ESI in MM6 */
04402                                 /* --- 1 */
04403                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
04404                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
04405                                 add esi, eax    /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
04406                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04407                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04408                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04409                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04410                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
04411                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
04412                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
04413                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
04414                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
04415                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
04416                                 /* --- 2 */
04417                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
04418                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
04419                                 add esi, eax    /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
04420                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04421                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04422                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04423                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04424                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
04425                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
04426                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
04427                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
04428                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
04429                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
04430                                 /* --- 3 */
04431                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
04432                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
04433                                 add esi, eax    /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
04434                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04435                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04436                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04437                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04438                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
04439                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
04440                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
04441                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
04442                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
04443                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
04444                                 /* --- 4 */
04445                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
04446                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
04447                                 add esi, eax    /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
04448                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04449                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04450                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04451                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04452                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
04453                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
04454                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
04455                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
04456                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
04457                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
04458                                 /* --- 5 */
04459                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
04460                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
04461                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04462                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04463                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04464                         punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
04465                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
04466                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
04467                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
04468                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
04469                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
04470                                 /* ---, */
04471                                 movq mm3, mm7           /* copy MM7 into MM3 */
04472                                 psrlq mm7, 32           /* shift 2 left words to the right */
04473                                 paddsw mm7, mm3         /* add 2 left and 2 right result words */
04474                                 movq mm2, mm7           /* copy MM7 into MM2 */
04475                                 psrlq mm7, 16           /* shift 1 left word to the right */
04476                                 paddsw mm7, mm2         /* add 1 left and 1 right result words */
04477                                 /* ---, */
04478                                 movd mm1, eax           /* save EDX in MM1 */
04479                                 movd mm2, ebx           /* save EDX in MM2 */
04480                                 movd mm3, edx           /* save EDX in MM3 */
04481                                 movd eax, mm7           /* load summation result into EAX */
04482                                 psraw mm7, 15           /* spread sign bit of the result */
04483                                 movd ebx, mm5           /* load Divisor into EBX */
04484                                 movd edx, mm7           /* fill EDX with a sign bit */
04485                                 idiv bx         /* IDIV - VERY EXPENSIVE */
04486                                 movd mm7, eax           /* move result of division into MM7 */
04487                                 packuswb mm7, mm0       /* pack division result with saturation */
04488                                 movd eax, mm7           /* copy saturated result into EAX */
04489                                 mov [edi], al           /* copy a byte result into Dest */
04490                                 movd edx, mm3           /* restore saved EDX */
04491                                 movd ebx, mm2           /* restore saved EBX */
04492                                 movd eax, mm1           /* restore saved EAX */
04493                                 /* --, */
04494                                 movd esi, mm6           /* move Src pointer to the top pixel */
04495                                 sub edx, 72     /* EDX = Kernel address */
04496                                 inc              esi            /* move Src  pointer to the next pixel */
04497                                 inc              edi            /* move Dest pointer to the next pixel */
04498                                 /* ---, */
04499                                 dec              ecx            /* decrease loop counter COLUMNS */
04500                                 jnz            L10332           /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
04501                                 add esi, 4      /* move to the next row in Src */
04502                                 add edi, 4      /* move to the next row in Dest */
04503                                 dec              ebx            /* decrease loop counter ROWS */
04504                                 jnz            L10330           /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
04505                                 /* ---, */
04506                                 emms                            /* exit MMX state */
04507                                 popa
04508                 }
04509 #else
04510                 asm volatile
04511                         ("pusha              \n\t" "pxor      %%mm0, %%mm0 \n\t"        /* zero MM0 */
04512                         "xor       %%ebx, %%ebx \n\t"   /* zero EBX */
04513                         "mov           %5, %%bl \n\t"   /* load Divisor into BL */
04514                         "movd      %%ebx, %%mm5 \n\t"   /* copy Divisor into MM5 */
04515                         "mov          %4, %%edx \n\t"   /* load Kernel address into EDX */
04516                         "mov          %1, %%esi \n\t"   /* load Src  address to ESI */
04517                         "mov          %0, %%edi \n\t"   /* load Dest address to EDI */
04518                         "add          $2, %%edi \n\t"   /* 2 column offset from the left edge */
04519                         "mov          %3, %%eax \n\t"   /* load columns into EAX */
04520                         "shl          $1, %%eax \n\t"   /* EAX = columns * 2 */
04521                         "add       %%eax, %%edi \n\t"   /* 2 row offset from the top edge */
04522                         "shr          $1, %%eax \n\t"   /* EAX = columns */
04523                         "mov          %2, %%ebx \n\t"   /* initialize ROWS counter */
04524                         "sub          $4, %%ebx \n\t"   /* do not use first 2 and last 2 rows */
04525                         /* --- */
04526                         ".L10330:               \n\t" "mov       %%eax, %%ecx \n\t"     /* initialize COLUMNS counter */
04527                         "sub          $4, %%ecx \n\t"   /* do not use first 2 and last 2 columns */
04528                         ".align 16              \n\t"   /* 16 byte alignment of the loop entry */
04529                         ".L10332:               \n\t" "pxor      %%mm7, %%mm7 \n\t"     /* zero MM7 (accumulator) */
04530                         "movd      %%esi, %%mm6 \n\t"   /* save ESI in MM6 */
04531                         /* --- 1 */
04532                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm1 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
04533                         "movq      %%mm1, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
04534                         "add       %%eax, %%esi \n\t"   /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
04535                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm3 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04536                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04537                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm4 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04538                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04539                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
04540                         "punpckhbw %%mm0, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
04541                         "pmullw    %%mm3, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
04542                         "pmullw    %%mm4, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
04543                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
04544                         "paddsw    %%mm1, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
04545                         /* --- 2 */
04546                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm1 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
04547                         "movq      %%mm1, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
04548                         "add       %%eax, %%esi \n\t"   /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
04549                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm3 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04550                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04551                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm4 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04552                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04553                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
04554                         "punpckhbw %%mm0, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
04555                         "pmullw    %%mm3, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
04556                         "pmullw    %%mm4, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
04557                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
04558                         "paddsw    %%mm1, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
04559                         /* --- 3 */
04560                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm1 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
04561                         "movq      %%mm1, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
04562                         "add       %%eax, %%esi \n\t"   /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
04563                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm3 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04564                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04565                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm4 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04566                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04567                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
04568                         "punpckhbw %%mm0, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
04569                         "pmullw    %%mm3, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
04570                         "pmullw    %%mm4, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
04571                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
04572                         "paddsw    %%mm1, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
04573                         /* --- 4 */
04574                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm1 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
04575                         "movq      %%mm1, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
04576                         "add       %%eax, %%esi \n\t"   /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
04577                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm3 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04578                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04579                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm4 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04580                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04581                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
04582                         "punpckhbw %%mm0, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
04583                         "pmullw    %%mm3, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
04584                         "pmullw    %%mm4, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
04585                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
04586                         "paddsw    %%mm1, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
04587                         /* --- 5 */
04588                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm1 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
04589                         "movq      %%mm1, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
04590                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm3 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04591                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04592                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm4 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04593                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
04594                         "punpckhbw %%mm0, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
04595                         "pmullw    %%mm3, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
04596                         "pmullw    %%mm4, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
04597                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
04598                         "paddsw    %%mm1, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
04599                         /* --- */
04600                         "movq      %%mm7, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* copy MM7 into MM3 */
04601                         "psrlq       $32, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* shift 2 left words to the right */
04602                         "paddsw    %%mm3, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add 2 left and 2 right result words */
04603                         "movq      %%mm7, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM7 into MM2 */
04604                         "psrlq       $16, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* shift 1 left word to the right */
04605                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add 1 left and 1 right result words */
04606                         /* --- */
04607                         "movd      %%eax, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* save EDX in MM1 */
04608                         "movd      %%ebx, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* save EDX in MM2 */
04609                         "movd      %%edx, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* save EDX in MM3 */
04610                         "movd      %%mm7, %%eax \n\t"   /* load summation result into EAX */
04611                         "psraw       $15, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* spread sign bit of the result */
04612                         "movd      %%mm5, %%ebx \n\t"   /* load Divisor into EBX */
04613                         "movd      %%mm7, %%edx \n\t"   /* fill EDX with a sign bit */
04614                         "idivw             %%bx \n\t"   /* IDIV - VERY EXPENSIVE */
04615                         "movd      %%eax, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* move result of division into MM7 */
04616                         "packuswb  %%mm0, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* pack division result with saturation */
04617                         "movd      %%mm7, %%eax \n\t"   /* copy saturated result into EAX */
04618                         "mov      %%al, (%%edi) \n\t"   /* copy a byte result into Dest */
04619                         "movd      %%mm3, %%edx \n\t"   /* restore saved EDX */
04620                         "movd      %%mm2, %%ebx \n\t"   /* restore saved EBX */
04621                         "movd      %%mm1, %%eax \n\t"   /* restore saved EAX */
04622                         /* -- */
04623                         "movd      %%mm6, %%esi \n\t"   /* move Src pointer to the top pixel */
04624                         "sub         $72, %%edx \n\t"   /* EDX = Kernel address */
04625                         "inc              %%esi \n\t"   /* move Src  pointer to the next pixel */
04626                         "inc              %%edi \n\t"   /* move Dest pointer to the next pixel */
04627                         /* --- */
04628                         "dec              %%ecx \n\t"   /* decrease loop counter COLUMNS */
04629                         "jnz            .L10332 \n\t"   /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
04630                         "add          $4, %%esi \n\t"   /* move to the next row in Src */
04631                         "add          $4, %%edi \n\t"   /* move to the next row in Dest */
04632                         "dec              %%ebx \n\t"   /* decrease loop counter ROWS */
04633                         "jnz            .L10330 \n\t"   /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
04634                         /* --- */
04635                         "emms                   \n\t"   /* exit MMX state */
04636                         "popa                   \n\t":"=m" (Dest)       /* %0 */
04637                         :"m"(Src),              /* %1 */
04638                         "m"(rows),              /* %2 */
04639                         "m"(columns),           /* %3 */
04640                         "m"(Kernel),            /* %4 */
04641                         "m"(Divisor)            /* %5 */
04642                         );
04643 #endif
04644 #endif
04645                 return (0);
04646         } else {
04647                 /* No non-MMX implementation yet */
04648                 return (-1);
04649         }
04650 }
04651 
04666 int SDL_imageFilterConvolveKernel7x7Divide(unsigned char *Src, unsigned char *Dest, int rows, int columns,
04667                                                                                    signed short *Kernel, unsigned char Divisor)
04668 {
04669         /* Validate input parameters */
04670         if ((Src == NULL) || (Dest == NULL) || (Kernel == NULL))
04671                 return(-1);
04672 
04673         if ((columns < 7) || (rows < 7) || (Divisor == 0))
04674                 return (-1);
04675 
04676         if ((SDL_imageFilterMMXdetect())) {
04677 #ifdef USE_MMX
04678 #if !defined(GCC__)
04679                 __asm
04680                 {
04681                         pusha
04682                                 pxor mm0, mm0           /* zero MM0 */
04683                                 xor ebx, ebx    /* zero EBX */
04684                                 mov bl, Divisor         /* load Divisor into BL */
04685                                 movd mm5, ebx           /* copy Divisor into MM5 */
04686                                 mov edx, Kernel         /* load Kernel address into EDX */
04687                                 mov esi, Src    /* load Src  address to ESI */
04688                                 mov edi, Dest           /* load Dest address to EDI */
04689                                 add edi, 3      /* 3 column offset from the left edge */
04690                                 mov eax, columns        /* load columns into EAX */
04691                                 add edi, eax    /* 3 row offset from the top edge */
04692                                 add edi, eax
04693                                 add edi, eax
04694                                 mov ebx, rows           /* initialize ROWS counter */
04695                                 sub ebx, 6      /* do not use first 3 and last 3 rows */
04696                                 /* ---, */
04697 L10340:
04698                         mov ecx, eax    /* initialize COLUMNS counter */
04699                                 sub ecx, 6      /* do not use first 3 and last 3 columns */
04700                                 align 16                        /* 16 byte alignment of the loop entry */
04701 L10342:
04702                         pxor mm7, mm7           /* zero MM7 (accumulator) */
04703                                 movd mm6, esi           /* save ESI in MM6 */
04704                                 /* --- 1 */
04705                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
04706                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
04707                                 add esi, eax    /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
04708                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04709                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04710                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04711                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04712                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
04713                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
04714                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
04715                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
04716                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
04717                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
04718                                 /* --- 2 */
04719                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
04720                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
04721                                 add esi, eax    /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
04722                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04723                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04724                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04725                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04726                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
04727                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
04728                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
04729                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
04730                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
04731                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
04732                                 /* --- 3 */
04733                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
04734                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
04735                                 add esi, eax    /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
04736                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04737                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04738                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04739                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04740                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
04741                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
04742                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
04743                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
04744                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
04745                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
04746                                 /* --- 4 */
04747                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
04748                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
04749                                 add esi, eax    /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
04750                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04751                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04752                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04753                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04754                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
04755                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
04756                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
04757                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
04758                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
04759                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
04760                                 /* --- 5 */
04761                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
04762                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
04763                                 add esi, eax    /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
04764                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04765                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04766                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04767                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04768                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
04769                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
04770                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
04771                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
04772                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
04773                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
04774                                 /* --- 6 */
04775                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
04776                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
04777                                 add esi, eax    /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
04778                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04779                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04780                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04781                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04782                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
04783                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
04784                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
04785                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
04786                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
04787                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
04788                                 /* --- 7 */
04789                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
04790                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
