04791                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04792                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04793                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04794                         punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
04795                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
04796                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
04797                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
04798                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
04799                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
04800                                 /* ---, */
04801                                 movq mm3, mm7           /* copy MM7 into MM3 */
04802                                 psrlq mm7, 32           /* shift 2 left words to the right */
04803                                 paddsw mm7, mm3         /* add 2 left and 2 right result words */
04804                                 movq mm2, mm7           /* copy MM7 into MM2 */
04805                                 psrlq mm7, 16           /* shift 1 left word to the right */
04806                                 paddsw mm7, mm2         /* add 1 left and 1 right result words */
04807                                 /* ---, */
04808                                 movd mm1, eax           /* save EDX in MM1 */
04809                                 movd mm2, ebx           /* save EDX in MM2 */
04810                                 movd mm3, edx           /* save EDX in MM3 */
04811                                 movd eax, mm7           /* load summation result into EAX */
04812                                 psraw mm7, 15           /* spread sign bit of the result */
04813                                 movd ebx, mm5           /* load Divisor into EBX */
04814                                 movd edx, mm7           /* fill EDX with a sign bit */
04815                                 idiv bx         /* IDIV - VERY EXPENSIVE */
04816                                 movd mm7, eax           /* move result of division into MM7 */
04817                                 packuswb mm7, mm0       /* pack division result with saturation */
04818                                 movd eax, mm7           /* copy saturated result into EAX */
04819                                 mov [edi], al           /* copy a byte result into Dest */
04820                                 movd edx, mm3           /* restore saved EDX */
04821                                 movd ebx, mm2           /* restore saved EBX */
04822                                 movd eax, mm1           /* restore saved EAX */
04823                                 /* --, */
04824                                 movd esi, mm6           /* move Src pointer to the top pixel */
04825                                 sub edx, 104    /* EDX = Kernel address */
04826                                 inc              esi            /* move Src  pointer to the next pixel */
04827                                 inc              edi            /* move Dest pointer to the next pixel */
04828                                 /* ---, */
04829                                 dec              ecx            /* decrease loop counter COLUMNS */
04830                                 jnz            L10342           /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
04831                                 add esi, 6      /* move to the next row in Src */
04832                                 add edi, 6      /* move to the next row in Dest */
04833                                 dec              ebx            /* decrease loop counter ROWS */
04834                                 jnz            L10340           /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
04835                                 /* ---, */
04836                                 emms                            /* exit MMX state */
04837                                 popa
04838                 }
04839 #else
04840                 asm volatile
04841                         ("pusha              \n\t" "pxor      %%mm0, %%mm0 \n\t"        /* zero MM0 */
04842                         "xor       %%ebx, %%ebx \n\t"   /* zero EBX */
04843                         "mov           %5, %%bl \n\t"   /* load Divisor into BL */
04844                         "movd      %%ebx, %%mm5 \n\t"   /* copy Divisor into MM5 */
04845                         "mov          %4, %%edx \n\t"   /* load Kernel address into EDX */
04846                         "mov          %1, %%esi \n\t"   /* load Src  address to ESI */
04847                         "mov          %0, %%edi \n\t"   /* load Dest address to EDI */
04848                         "add          $3, %%edi \n\t"   /* 3 column offset from the left edge */
04849                         "mov          %3, %%eax \n\t"   /* load columns into EAX */
04850                         "add       %%eax, %%edi \n\t"   /* 3 row offset from the top edge */
04851                         "add       %%eax, %%edi \n\t" "add       %%eax, %%edi \n\t" "mov          %2, %%ebx \n\t"       /* initialize ROWS counter */
04852                         "sub          $6, %%ebx \n\t"   /* do not use first 3 and last 3 rows */

04857                         ".L10342:               \n\t" "pxor      %%mm7, %%mm7 \n\t"     /* zero MM7 (accumulator) */

04860                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm1 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
04861                         "movq      %%mm1, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
04862                         "add       %%eax, %%esi \n\t"   /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
04863                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm3 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04864                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04865                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm4 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04866                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04867                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
04868                         "punpckhbw %%mm0, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */

04870                         "pmullw    %%mm4, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
04871                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
04872                         "paddsw    %%mm1, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
04873                         /* --- 2 */
04874                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm1 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
04875                         "movq      %%mm1, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
04876                         "add       %%eax, %%esi \n\t"   /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
04877                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm3 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04878                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04879                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm4 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04880                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04881                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
04882                         "punpckhbw %%mm0, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
04883                         "pmullw    %%mm3, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
04884                         "pmullw    %%mm4, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
04885                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
04886                         "paddsw    %%mm1, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
04887                         /* --- 3 */
04888                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm1 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
04889                         "movq      %%mm1, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM1 into MM2 */

04942                         "paddsw    %%mm1, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
04943                         /* --- 7 */
04944                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm1 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
04945                         "movq      %%mm1, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
04946                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm3 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04947                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
04948                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm4 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
04949                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
04950                         "punpckhbw %%mm0, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
04951                         "pmullw    %%mm3, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
04952                         "pmullw    %%mm4, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
04953                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
04954                         "paddsw    %%mm1, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
04955                         /* --- */
04956                         "movq      %%mm7, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* copy MM7 into MM3 */
04957                         "psrlq       $32, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* shift 2 left words to the right */
04958                         "paddsw    %%mm3, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add 2 left and 2 right result words */
04959                         "movq      %%mm7, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM7 into MM2 */
04960                         "psrlq       $16, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* shift 1 left word to the right */
04961                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add 1 left and 1 right result words */
04962                         /* --- */
04963                         "movd      %%eax, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* save EDX in MM1 */
04964                         "movd      %%ebx, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* save EDX in MM2 */
04965                         "movd      %%edx, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* save EDX in MM3 */
04966                         "movd      %%mm7, %%eax \n\t"   /* load summation result into EAX */
04967                         "psraw       $15, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* spread sign bit of the result */
04968                         "movd      %%mm5, %%ebx \n\t"   /* load Divisor into EBX */
04969                         "movd      %%mm7, %%edx \n\t"   /* fill EDX with a sign bit */
04970                         "idivw             %%bx \n\t"   /* IDIV - VERY EXPENSIVE */
04971                         "movd      %%eax, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* move result of division into MM7 */
04972                         "packuswb  %%mm0, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* pack division result with saturation */
04973                         "movd      %%mm7, %%eax \n\t"   /* copy saturated result into EAX */
04974                         "mov      %%al, (%%edi) \n\t"   /* copy a byte result into Dest */
04975                         "movd      %%mm3, %%edx \n\t"   /* restore saved EDX */
04976                         "movd      %%mm2, %%ebx \n\t"   /* restore saved EBX */
04977                         "movd      %%mm1, %%eax \n\t"   /* restore saved EAX */
04978                         /* -- */
04979                         "movd      %%mm6, %%esi \n\t"   /* move Src pointer to the top pixel */
04980                         "sub        $104, %%edx \n\t"   /* EDX = Kernel address */
04981                         "inc              %%esi \n\t"   /* move Src  pointer to the next pixel */
04982                         "inc              %%edi \n\t"   /* move Dest pointer to the next pixel */
04983                         /* --- */
04984                         "dec              %%ecx \n\t"   /* decrease loop counter COLUMNS */
04985                         "jnz            .L10342 \n\t"   /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
04986                         "add          $6, %%esi \n\t"   /* move to the next row in Src */
04987                         "add          $6, %%edi \n\t"   /* move to the next row in Dest */
04988                         "dec              %%ebx \n\t"   /* decrease loop counter ROWS */
04989                         "jnz            .L10340 \n\t"   /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
04990                         /* --- */
04991                         "emms                   \n\t"   /* exit MMX state */
04992                         "popa                   \n\t":"=m" (Dest)       /* %0 */
04993                         :"m"(Src),              /* %1 */
04994                         "m"(rows),              /* %2 */
04995                         "m"(columns),           /* %3 */
04996                         "m"(Kernel),            /* %4 */
04997                         "m"(Divisor)            /* %5 */
04998                         );
04999 #endif
05000 #endif
05001                 return (0);
05002         } else {
05003                 /* No non-MMX implementation yet */
05004                 return (-1);
05005         }
05006 }
05007 
05022 int SDL_imageFilterConvolveKernel9x9Divide(unsigned char *Src, unsigned char *Dest, int rows, int columns,
05023                                                                                    signed short *Kernel, unsigned char Divisor)
05024 {
05025         /* Validate input parameters */
05026         if ((Src == NULL) || (Dest == NULL) || (Kernel == NULL))
05027                 return(-1);
05028 
05029         if ((columns < 9) || (rows < 9) || (Divisor == 0))
05030                 return (-1);
05031 
05032         if ((SDL_imageFilterMMXdetect())) {
05033 #ifdef USE_MMX
05034 #if !defined(GCC__)
05035                 __asm
05036                 {
05037                         pusha
05038                                 pxor mm0, mm0           /* zero MM0 */
05039                                 xor ebx, ebx    /* zero EBX */
05040                                 mov bl, Divisor         /* load Divisor into BL */
05041                                 movd mm5, ebx           /* copy Divisor into MM5 */
05042                                 mov edx, Kernel         /* load Kernel address into EDX */
05043                                 mov esi, Src    /* load Src  address to ESI */
05044                                 mov edi, Dest           /* load Dest address to EDI */
05045                                 add edi, 4      /* 4 column offset from the left edge */
05046                                 mov eax, columns        /* load columns into EAX */
05047                                 add edi, eax    /* 4 row offset from the top edge */
05048                                 add edi, eax
05049                                 add edi, eax
05050                                 add edi, eax
05051                                 mov ebx, rows           /* initialize ROWS counter */
05052                                 sub ebx, 8      /* do not use first 4 and last 4 rows */
05053                                 /* ---, */
05054 L10350:
05055                         mov ecx, eax    /* initialize COLUMNS counter */
05056                                 sub ecx, 8      /* do not use first 4 and last 4 columns */
05057                                 align 16                        /* 16 byte alignment of the loop entry */
05058 L10352:
05059                         pxor mm7, mm7           /* zero MM7 (accumulator) */
05060                                 movd mm6, esi           /* save ESI in MM6 */
05061                                 /* --- 1 */
05062                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
05063                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
05064                                 inc              esi            /* move pointer to the next 8 bytes of Src */
05065                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05066                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05067                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05068                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05069                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
05070                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
05071                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
05072                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult. 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
05073                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
05074                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
05075                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
05076                         dec              esi
05077                                 add esi, eax    /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
05078                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05079                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05080                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
05081                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
05082                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
05083                                 /* --- 2 */
05084                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
05085                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
05086                                 inc              esi            /* move pointer to the next 8 bytes of Src */
05087                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05088                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05089                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05090                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05091                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
05092                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
05093                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
05094                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult. 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
05095                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
05096                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
05097                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
05098                         dec              esi
05099                                 add esi, eax    /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
05100                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05101                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05102                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
05103                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
05104                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
05105                                 /* --- 3 */

05202                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
05203                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
05204                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult. 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
05205                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
05206                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
05207                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
05208                         dec              esi
05209                                 add esi, eax    /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
05210                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05211                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05212                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
05213                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
05214                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
05215                                 /* --- 8 */
05216                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
05217                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
05218                                 inc              esi            /* move pointer to the next 8 bytes of Src */
05219                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05220                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05221                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05222                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05223                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
05224                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
05225                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
05226                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult. 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
05227                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
05228                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
05229                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
05230                         dec              esi
05231                                 add esi, eax    /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
05232                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05233                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05234                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
05235                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
05236                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
05237                                 /* --- 9 */
05238                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
05239                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
05240                                 inc              esi            /* move pointer to the next 8 bytes of Src */
05241                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05242                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05243                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05244                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05245                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
05246                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
05247                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
05248                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult. 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
05249                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
05250                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
05251                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
05252                         movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05253                         punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
05254                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
05255                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
05256                                 /* ---, */
05257                                 movq mm3, mm7           /* copy MM7 into MM3 */
05258                                 psrlq mm7, 32           /* shift 2 left words to the right */
05259                                 paddsw mm7, mm3         /* add 2 left and 2 right result words */
05260                                 movq mm2, mm7           /* copy MM7 into MM2 */
05261                                 psrlq mm7, 16           /* shift 1 left word to the right */
05262                                 paddsw mm7, mm2         /* add 1 left and 1 right result words */
05263                                 /* ---, */
05264                                 movd mm1, eax           /* save EDX in MM1 */
05265                                 movd mm2, ebx           /* save EDX in MM2 */
05266                                 movd mm3, edx           /* save EDX in MM3 */
05267                                 movd eax, mm7           /* load summation result into EAX */
05268                                 psraw mm7, 15           /* spread sign bit of the result */
05269                                 movd ebx, mm5           /* load Divisor into EBX */
05270                                 movd edx, mm7           /* fill EDX with a sign bit */
05271                                 idiv bx         /* IDIV - VERY EXPENSIVE */
05272                                 movd mm7, eax           /* move result of division into MM7 */
05273                                 packuswb mm7, mm0       /* pack division result with saturation */
05274                                 movd eax, mm7           /* copy saturated result into EAX */
05275                                 mov [edi], al           /* copy a byte result into Dest */
05276                                 movd edx, mm3           /* restore saved EDX */
05277                                 movd ebx, mm2           /* restore saved EBX */
05278                                 movd eax, mm1           /* restore saved EAX */
05279                                 /* --, */
05280                                 movd esi, mm6           /* move Src pointer to the top pixel */
05281                                 sub edx, 208    /* EDX = Kernel address */
05282                                 inc              esi            /* move Src  pointer to the next pixel */
05283                                 inc              edi            /* move Dest pointer to the next pixel */
05284                                 /* ---, */
05285                                 dec              ecx            /* decrease loop counter COLUMNS */
05286                                 jnz            L10352           /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
05287                                 add esi, 8      /* move to the next row in Src */
05288                                 add edi, 8      /* move to the next row in Dest */
05289                                 dec              ebx            /* decrease loop counter ROWS */
05290                                 jnz            L10350           /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
05291                                 /* ---, */
05292                                 emms                            /* exit MMX state */
05293                                 popa
05294                 }
