05494                         "pmullw    %%mm4, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
05495                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
05496                         "paddsw    %%mm1, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
05497                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm1 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
05498                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm3 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05499                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
05500                         "pmullw    %%mm3, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
05501                         "paddsw    %%mm1, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
05502                         /* --- */
05503                         "movq      %%mm7, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* copy MM7 into MM3 */
05504                         "psrlq       $32, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* shift 2 left words to the right */
05505                         "paddsw    %%mm3, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add 2 left and 2 right result words */
05506                         "movq      %%mm7, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM7 into MM2 */
05507                         "psrlq       $16, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* shift 1 left word to the right */
05508                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add 1 left and 1 right result words */
05509                         /* --- */
05510                         "movd      %%eax, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* save EDX in MM1 */
05511                         "movd      %%ebx, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* save EDX in MM2 */
05512                         "movd      %%edx, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* save EDX in MM3 */
05513                         "movd      %%mm7, %%eax \n\t"   /* load summation result into EAX */
05514                         "psraw       $15, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* spread sign bit of the result */
05515                         "movd      %%mm5, %%ebx \n\t"   /* load Divisor into EBX */
05516                         "movd      %%mm7, %%edx \n\t"   /* fill EDX with a sign bit */
05517                         "idivw             %%bx \n\t"   /* IDIV - VERY EXPENSIVE */
05518                         "movd      %%eax, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* move result of division into MM7 */
05519                         "packuswb  %%mm0, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* pack division result with saturation */
05520                         "movd      %%mm7, %%eax \n\t"   /* copy saturated result into EAX */
05521                         "mov      %%al, (%%edi) \n\t"   /* copy a byte result into Dest */
05522                         "movd      %%mm3, %%edx \n\t"   /* restore saved EDX */
05523                         "movd      %%mm2, %%ebx \n\t"   /* restore saved EBX */
05524                         "movd      %%mm1, %%eax \n\t"   /* restore saved EAX */
05525                         /* -- */
05526                         "movd      %%mm6, %%esi \n\t"   /* move Src pointer to the top pixel */
05527                         "sub        $208, %%edx \n\t"   /* EDX = Kernel address */
05528                         "inc              %%esi \n\t"   /* move Src  pointer to the next pixel */
05529                         "inc              %%edi \n\t"   /* move Dest pointer to the next pixel */
05530                         /* --- */
05531                         "dec              %%ecx \n\t"   /* decrease loop counter COLUMNS */
05532                         "jnz            .L10352 \n\t"   /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
05533                         "add          $8, %%esi \n\t"   /* move to the next row in Src */
05534                         "add          $8, %%edi \n\t"   /* move to the next row in Dest */
05535                         "dec              %%ebx \n\t"   /* decrease loop counter ROWS */
05536                         "jnz            .L10350 \n\t"   /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
05537                         /* --- */
05538                         "emms                   \n\t"   /* exit MMX state */
05539                         "popa                   \n\t":"=m" (Dest)       /* %0 */
05540                         :"m"(Src),              /* %1 */
05541                         "m"(rows),              /* %2 */
05542                         "m"(columns),           /* %3 */
05543                         "m"(Kernel),            /* %4 */
05544                         "m"(Divisor)            /* %5 */
05545                         );
05546 #endif
05547 #endif
05548                 return (0);
05549         } else {
05550                 /* No non-MMX implementation yet */
05551                 return (-1);
05552         }
05553 }
05554 
05569 int SDL_imageFilterConvolveKernel3x3ShiftRight(unsigned char *Src, unsigned char *Dest, int rows, int columns,
05570                                                                                            signed short *Kernel, unsigned char NRightShift)
05571 {
05572         /* Validate input parameters */
05573         if ((Src == NULL) || (Dest == NULL) || (Kernel == NULL))
05574                 return(-1);
05575 
05576         if ((columns < 3) || (rows < 3) || (NRightShift > 7))
05577                 return (-1);
05578 
05579         if ((SDL_imageFilterMMXdetect())) {
05580 #ifdef USE_MMX
05581 #if !defined(GCC__)
05582                 __asm
05583                 {
05584                         pusha
05585                                 pxor mm0, mm0           /* zero MM0 */
05586                                 xor ebx, ebx    /* zero EBX */
05587                                 mov bl, NRightShift     /* load NRightShift into BL */
05588                                 movd mm4, ebx           /* copy NRightShift into MM4 */
05589                                 mov edx, Kernel         /* load Kernel address into EDX */
05590                                 movq mm5, [edx]         /* MM5 = {0,K2,K1,K0} */
05591                         add edx, 8      /* second row              |K0 K1 K2 0| */
05592                                 movq mm6, [edx]         /* MM6 = {0,K5,K4,K3}  K = |K3 K4 K5 0| */
05593                         add edx, 8      /* third row               |K6 K7 K8 0| */
05594                                 movq mm7, [edx]         /* MM7 = {0,K8,K7,K6} */
05595                         /* ---, */
05596                         mov eax, columns        /* load columns into EAX */
05597                                 mov esi, Src    /* ESI = Src row 0 address */
05598                                 mov edi, Dest           /* load Dest address to EDI */
05599                                 add edi, eax    /* EDI = EDI + columns */
05600                                 inc              edi            /* 1 byte offset from the left edge */
05601                                 mov edx, rows           /* initialize ROWS counter */
05602                                 sub edx, 2      /* do not use first and last row */
05603                                 /* ---, */
05604 L10360:
05605                         mov ecx, eax    /* initialize COLUMS counter */
05606                                 sub ecx, 2      /* do not use first and last column */
05607                                 align 16                        /* 16 byte alignment of the loop entry */
05608 L10362:
05609                         /* ---, */
05610                         movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the image first row */
05611                         add esi, eax    /* move one row below */
05612                                 movq mm2, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the image second row */
05613                         add esi, eax    /* move one row below */
05614                                 movq mm3, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the image third row */
05615                         punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first 4 bytes into words */
05616                                 punpcklbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack first 4 bytes into words */
05617                                 punpcklbw mm3, mm0      /* unpack first 4 bytes into words */
05618                                 psrlw mm1, mm4          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
05619                                 psrlw mm2, mm4          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
05620                                 psrlw mm3, mm4          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
05621                                 pmullw mm1, mm5         /* multiply words first row  image*Kernel */
05622                                 pmullw mm2, mm6         /* multiply words second row image*Kernel */
05623                                 pmullw mm3, mm7         /* multiply words third row  image*Kernel */
05624                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the first and second rows */
05625                                 paddsw mm1, mm3         /* add 4 words of the third row and result */
05626                                 movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
05627                                 psrlq mm1, 32           /* shift 2 left words to the right */
05628                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 2 left and 2 right result words */
05629                                 movq mm3, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM3 */
05630                                 psrlq mm1, 16           /* shift 1 left word to the right */
05631                                 paddsw mm1, mm3         /* add 1 left and 1 right result words */
05632                                 packuswb mm1, mm0       /* pack shift result with saturation */
05633                                 movd ebx, mm1           /* copy saturated result into EBX */
05634                                 mov [edi], bl           /* copy a byte result into Dest */
05635                                 /* --, */
05636                                 sub esi, eax    /* move two rows up */
05637                                 sub esi, eax
05638                                 inc              esi            /* move Src  pointer to the next pixel */
05639                                 inc              edi            /* move Dest pointer to the next pixel */
05640                                 /* ---, */
05641                                 dec              ecx            /* decrease loop counter COLUMNS */
05642                                 jnz            L10362           /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
05643                                 add esi, 2      /* move to the next row in Src */
05644                                 add edi, 2      /* move to the next row in Dest */
05645                                 dec              edx            /* decrease loop counter ROWS */
05646                                 jnz            L10360           /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
05647                                 /* ---, */
05648                                 emms                            /* exit MMX state */
05649                                 popa
05650                 }
05651 #else
05652                 asm volatile
05653                         ("pusha              \n\t" "pxor      %%mm0, %%mm0 \n\t"        /* zero MM0 */
05654                         "xor       %%ebx, %%ebx \n\t"   /* zero EBX */
05655                         "mov           %5, %%bl \n\t"   /* load NRightShift into BL */
05656                         "movd      %%ebx, %%mm4 \n\t"   /* copy NRightShift into MM4 */
05657                         "mov          %4, %%edx \n\t"   /* load Kernel address into EDX */
05658                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm5 \n\t"   /* MM5 = {0,K2,K1,K0} */
05659                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* second row              |K0 K1 K2 0| */
05660                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm6 \n\t"   /* MM6 = {0,K5,K4,K3}  K = |K3 K4 K5 0| */
05661                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* third row               |K6 K7 K8 0| */
05662                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm7 \n\t"   /* MM7 = {0,K8,K7,K6} */
05663                         /* --- */
05664                         "mov          %3, %%eax \n\t"   /* load columns into EAX */
05665                         "mov          %1, %%esi \n\t"   /* ESI = Src row 0 address */
05666                         "mov          %0, %%edi \n\t"   /* load Dest address to EDI */
05667                         "add       %%eax, %%edi \n\t"   /* EDI = EDI + columns */
05668                         "inc              %%edi \n\t"   /* 1 byte offset from the left edge */
05669                         "mov          %2, %%edx \n\t"   /* initialize ROWS counter */
05670                         "sub          $2, %%edx \n\t"   /* do not use first and last row */
05671                         /* --- */
05672                         ".L10360:               \n\t" "mov       %%eax, %%ecx \n\t"     /* initialize COLUMS counter */
05673                         "sub          $2, %%ecx \n\t"   /* do not use first and last column */
05674                         ".align 16              \n\t"   /* 16 byte alignment of the loop entry */
05675                         ".L10362:               \n\t"
05676                         /* --- */
05677                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm1 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes of the image first row */
05678                         "add       %%eax, %%esi \n\t"   /* move one row below */
05679                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm2 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes of the image second row */
05680                         "add       %%eax, %%esi \n\t"   /* move one row below */
05681                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm3 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes of the image third row */
05682                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* unpack first 4 bytes into words */
05683                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* unpack first 4 bytes into words */
05684                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* unpack first 4 bytes into words */
05685                         "psrlw     %%mm4, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
05686                         "psrlw     %%mm4, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
05687                         "psrlw     %%mm4, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
05688                         "pmullw    %%mm5, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* multiply words first row  image*Kernel */
05689                         "pmullw    %%mm6, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* multiply words second row image*Kernel */
05690                         "pmullw    %%mm7, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* multiply words third row  image*Kernel */
05691                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* add 4 words of the first and second rows */
05692                         "paddsw    %%mm3, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* add 4 words of the third row and result */
05693                         "movq      %%mm1, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
05694                         "psrlq       $32, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* shift 2 left words to the right */
05695                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* add 2 left and 2 right result words */
05696                         "movq      %%mm1, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* copy MM1 into MM3 */
05697                         "psrlq       $16, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* shift 1 left word to the right */
05698                         "paddsw    %%mm3, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* add 1 left and 1 right result words */
05699                         "packuswb  %%mm0, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* pack shift result with saturation */
05700                         "movd      %%mm1, %%ebx \n\t"   /* copy saturated result into EBX */
05701                         "mov      %%bl, (%%edi) \n\t"   /* copy a byte result into Dest */
05702                         /* -- */
05703                         "sub       %%eax, %%esi \n\t"   /* move two rows up */
05704                         "sub       %%eax, %%esi \n\t" "inc              %%esi \n\t"     /* move Src  pointer to the next pixel */
05705                         "inc              %%edi \n\t"   /* move Dest pointer to the next pixel */
05706                         /* --- */
05707                         "dec              %%ecx \n\t"   /* decrease loop counter COLUMNS */
05708                         "jnz            .L10362 \n\t"   /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
05709                         "add          $2, %%esi \n\t"   /* move to the next row in Src */
05710                         "add          $2, %%edi \n\t"   /* move to the next row in Dest */
05711                         "dec              %%edx \n\t"   /* decrease loop counter ROWS */
05712                         "jnz            .L10360 \n\t"   /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
05713                         /* --- */
05714                         "emms                   \n\t"   /* exit MMX state */
05715                         "popa                   \n\t":"=m" (Dest)       /* %0 */
05716                         :"m"(Src),              /* %1 */
05717                         "m"(rows),              /* %2 */
05718                         "m"(columns),           /* %3 */
05719                         "m"(Kernel),            /* %4 */
05720                         "m"(NRightShift)        /* %5 */
05721                         );
05722 #endif
05723 #endif
05724                 return (0);
05725         } else {
05726                 /* No non-MMX implementation yet */
05727                 return (-1);
05728         }
05729 }
05730 
05745 int SDL_imageFilterConvolveKernel5x5ShiftRight(unsigned char *Src, unsigned char *Dest, int rows, int columns,
05746                                                                                            signed short *Kernel, unsigned char NRightShift)
05747 {
05748         /* Validate input parameters */
05749         if ((Src == NULL) || (Dest == NULL) || (Kernel == NULL))
05750                 return(-1);
05751 
05752         if ((columns < 5) || (rows < 5) || (NRightShift > 7))
05753                 return (-1);
05754 
05755         if ((SDL_imageFilterMMXdetect())) {
05756 #ifdef USE_MMX
05757 #if !defined(GCC__)
05758                 __asm
05759                 {
05760                         pusha
05761                                 pxor mm0, mm0           /* zero MM0 */
05762                                 xor ebx, ebx    /* zero EBX */
05763                                 mov bl, NRightShift     /* load NRightShift into BL */
05764                                 movd mm5, ebx           /* copy NRightShift into MM5 */
05765                                 mov edx, Kernel         /* load Kernel address into EDX */
05766                                 mov esi, Src    /* load Src  address to ESI */
05767                                 mov edi, Dest           /* load Dest address to EDI */
05768                                 add edi, 2      /* 2 column offset from the left edge */
05769                                 mov eax, columns        /* load columns into EAX */
05770                                 shl eax, 1      /* EAX = columns * 2 */
05771                                 add edi, eax    /* 2 row offset from the top edge */
05772                                 shr eax, 1      /* EAX = columns */
05773                                 mov ebx, rows           /* initialize ROWS counter */
05774                                 sub ebx, 4      /* do not use first 2 and last 2 rows */
05775                                 /* ---, */
05776 L10370:
05777                         mov ecx, eax    /* initialize COLUMNS counter */
05778                                 sub ecx, 4      /* do not use first 2 and last 2 columns */
05779                                 align 16                        /* 16 byte alignment of the loop entry */
05780 L10372:
05781                         pxor mm7, mm7           /* zero MM7 (accumulator) */
05782                                 movd mm6, esi           /* save ESI in MM6 */
05783                                 /* --- 1 */
05784                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
05785                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
05786                                 add esi, eax    /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
05787                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05788                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05789                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05790                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05791                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
05792                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
05793                                 psrlw mm1, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
05794                                 psrlw mm2, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
05795                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
05796                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
05797                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
05798                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
05799                                 /* --- 2 */
05800                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
05801                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
05802                                 add esi, eax    /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
05803                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05804                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05805                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05806                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05807                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
05808                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
05809                                 psrlw mm1, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
05810                                 psrlw mm2, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
05811                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
05812                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
05813                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
05814                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
05815                                 /* --- 3 */
05816                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
05817                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
05818                                 add esi, eax    /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
05819                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05820                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05821                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05822                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05823                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
05824                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
05825                                 psrlw mm1, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
05826                                 psrlw mm2, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
05827                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
05828                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
05829                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
05830                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
05831                                 /* --- 4 */
05832                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
05833                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
05834                                 add esi, eax    /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
05835                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05836                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05837                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05838                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05839                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
05840                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
05841                                 psrlw mm1, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
05842                                 psrlw mm2, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
05843                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
05844                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
05845                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
05846                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
05847                                 /* --- 5 */
05848                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
05849                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
05850                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05851                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05852                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05853                         punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
05854                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
05855                                 psrlw mm1, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
05856                                 psrlw mm2, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
05857                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
05858                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
05859                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
05860                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
05861                                 /* ---, */
05862                                 movq mm3, mm7           /* copy MM7 into MM3 */
05863                                 psrlq mm7, 32           /* shift 2 left words to the right */
05864                                 paddsw mm7, mm3         /* add 2 left and 2 right result words */
05865                                 movq mm2, mm7           /* copy MM7 into MM2 */
05866                                 psrlq mm7, 16           /* shift 1 left word to the right */
05867                                 paddsw mm7, mm2         /* add 1 left and 1 right result words */
05868                                 movd mm1, eax           /* save EAX in MM1 */
05869                                 packuswb mm7, mm0       /* pack division result with saturation */
05870                                 movd eax, mm7           /* copy saturated result into EAX */
05871                                 mov [edi], al           /* copy a byte result into Dest */
05872                                 movd eax, mm1           /* restore saved EAX */
05873                                 /* --, */
05874                                 movd esi, mm6           /* move Src pointer to the top pixel */
05875                                 sub edx, 72     /* EDX = Kernel address */
05876                                 inc              esi            /* move Src  pointer to the next pixel */
05877                                 inc              edi            /* move Dest pointer to the next pixel */
05878                                 /* ---, */
05879                                 dec              ecx            /* decrease loop counter COLUMNS */
05880                                 jnz            L10372           /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
05881                                 add esi, 4      /* move to the next row in Src */
05882                                 add edi, 4      /* move to the next row in Dest */
05883                                 dec              ebx            /* decrease loop counter ROWS */
05884                                 jnz            L10370           /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
05885                                 /* ---, */
05886                                 emms                            /* exit MMX state */
05887                                 popa
05888                 }
05889 #else
05890                 asm volatile
05891                         ("pusha              \n\t" "pxor      %%mm0, %%mm0 \n\t"        /* zero MM0 */
05892                         "xor       %%ebx, %%ebx \n\t"   /* zero EBX */
05893                         "mov           %5, %%bl \n\t"   /* load NRightShift into BL */
05894                         "movd      %%ebx, %%mm5 \n\t"   /* copy NRightShift into MM5 */
05895                         "mov          %4, %%edx \n\t"   /* load Kernel address into EDX */
05896                         "mov          %1, %%esi \n\t"   /* load Src  address to ESI */
05897                         "mov          %0, %%edi \n\t"   /* load Dest address to EDI */
05898                         "add          $2, %%edi \n\t"   /* 2 column offset from the left edge */
05899                         "mov          %3, %%eax \n\t"   /* load columns into EAX */
05900                         "shl          $1, %%eax \n\t"   /* EAX = columns * 2 */
05901                         "add       %%eax, %%edi \n\t"   /* 2 row offset from the top edge */
05902                         "shr          $1, %%eax \n\t"   /* EAX = columns */
05903                         "mov          %2, %%ebx \n\t"   /* initialize ROWS counter */
05904                         "sub          $4, %%ebx \n\t"   /* do not use first 2 and last 2 rows */
05905                         /* --- */
05906                         ".L10370:               \n\t" "mov       %%eax, %%ecx \n\t"     /* initialize COLUMNS counter */
05907                         "sub          $4, %%ecx \n\t"   /* do not use first 2 and last 2 columns */
05908                         ".align 16              \n\t"   /* 16 byte alignment of the loop entry */
05909                         ".L10372:               \n\t" "pxor      %%mm7, %%mm7 \n\t"     /* zero MM7 (accumulator) */
05910                         "movd      %%esi, %%mm6 \n\t"   /* save ESI in MM6 */
05911                         /* --- 1 */
05912                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm1 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
05913                         "movq      %%mm1, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
05914                         "add       %%eax, %%esi \n\t"   /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
05915                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm3 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05916                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05917                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm4 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05918                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05919                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
05920                         "punpckhbw %%mm0, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
05921                         "psrlw     %%mm5, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
05922                         "psrlw     %%mm5, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
05923                         "pmullw    %%mm3, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
05924                         "pmullw    %%mm4, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
05925                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
05926                         "paddsw    %%mm1, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
05927                         /* --- 2 */
05928                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm1 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
05929                         "movq      %%mm1, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
05930                         "add       %%eax, %%esi \n\t"   /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
05931                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm3 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05932                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05933                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm4 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05934                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05935                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
05936                         "punpckhbw %%mm0, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
05937                         "psrlw     %%mm5, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
05938                         "psrlw     %%mm5, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
05939                         "pmullw    %%mm3, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
05940                         "pmullw    %%mm4, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
05941                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
05942                         "paddsw    %%mm1, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
05943                         /* --- 3 */
05944                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm1 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
05945                         "movq      %%mm1, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
05946                         "add       %%eax, %%esi \n\t"   /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
05947                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm3 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05948                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05949                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm4 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05950                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05951                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
05952                         "punpckhbw %%mm0, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
05953                         "psrlw     %%mm5, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
05954                         "psrlw     %%mm5, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
05955                         "pmullw    %%mm3, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
05956                         "pmullw    %%mm4, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
05957                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
05958                         "paddsw    %%mm1, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
05959                         /* --- 4 */
05960                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm1 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
05961                         "movq      %%mm1, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
05962                         "add       %%eax, %%esi \n\t"   /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
05963                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm3 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05964                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05965                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm4 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05966                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05967                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
05968                         "punpckhbw %%mm0, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
05969                         "psrlw     %%mm5, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
05970                         "psrlw     %%mm5, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
05971                         "pmullw    %%mm3, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
05972                         "pmullw    %%mm4, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
05973                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
05974                         "paddsw    %%mm1, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
05975                         /* --- 5 */
05976                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm1 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
05977                         "movq      %%mm1, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
05978                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm3 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05979                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
05980                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm4 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
05981                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
05982                         "punpckhbw %%mm0, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
05983                         "psrlw     %%mm5, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
05984                         "psrlw     %%mm5, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
05985                         "pmullw    %%mm3, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
05986                         "pmullw    %%mm4, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
05987                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
05988                         "paddsw    %%mm1, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
05989                         /* --- */
05990                         "movq      %%mm7, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* copy MM7 into MM3 */
05991                         "psrlq       $32, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* shift 2 left words to the right */
05992                         "paddsw    %%mm3, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add 2 left and 2 right result words */
05993                         "movq      %%mm7, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM7 into MM2 */
05994                         "psrlq       $16, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* shift 1 left word to the right */
05995                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add 1 left and 1 right result words */
05996                         "movd      %%eax, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* save EAX in MM1 */
05997                         "packuswb  %%mm0, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* pack division result with saturation */
05998                         "movd      %%mm7, %%eax \n\t"   /* copy saturated result into EAX */
05999                         "mov      %%al, (%%edi) \n\t"   /* copy a byte result into Dest */
06000                         "movd      %%mm1, %%eax \n\t"   /* restore saved EAX */
06001                         /* -- */
06002                         "movd      %%mm6, %%esi \n\t"   /* move Src pointer to the top pixel */
06003                         "sub         $72, %%edx \n\t"   /* EDX = Kernel address */
06004                         "inc              %%esi \n\t"   /* move Src  pointer to the next pixel */
06005                         "inc              %%edi \n\t"   /* move Dest pointer to the next pixel */
06006                         /* --- */
06007                         "dec              %%ecx \n\t"   /* decrease loop counter COLUMNS */
06008                         "jnz            .L10372 \n\t"   /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
06009                         "add          $4, %%esi \n\t"   /* move to the next row in Src */
06010                         "add          $4, %%edi \n\t"   /* move to the next row in Dest */
06011                         "dec              %%ebx \n\t"   /* decrease loop counter ROWS */
06012                         "jnz            .L10370 \n\t"   /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
06013                         /* --- */
06014                         "emms                   \n\t"   /* exit MMX state */
06015                         "popa                   \n\t":"=m" (Dest)       /* %0 */
06016                         :"m"(Src),              /* %1 */
06017                         "m"(rows),              /* %2 */
06018                         "m"(columns),           /* %3 */
06019                         "m"(Kernel),            /* %4 */
06020                         "m"(NRightShift)        /* %5 */
06021                         );
06022 #endif
06023 #endif
06024                 return (0);
06025         } else {
06026                 /* No non-MMX implementation yet */
06027                 return (-1);
06028         }
06029 }
06030 
06045 int SDL_imageFilterConvolveKernel7x7ShiftRight(unsigned char *Src, unsigned char *Dest, int rows, int columns,
06046                                                                                            signed short *Kernel, unsigned char NRightShift)
06047 {
06048         /* Validate input parameters */
06049         if ((Src == NULL) || (Dest == NULL) || (Kernel == NULL))
06050                 return(-1);
06051 
06052         if ((columns < 7) || (rows < 7) || (NRightShift > 7))
06053                 return (-1);
06054 
06055         if ((SDL_imageFilterMMXdetect())) {
06056 #ifdef USE_MMX
06057 #if !defined(GCC__)
06058                 __asm
06059                 {
06060                         pusha
06061                                 pxor mm0, mm0           /* zero MM0 */
06062                                 xor ebx, ebx    /* zero EBX */
06063                                 mov bl, NRightShift     /* load NRightShift into BL */
06064                                 movd mm5, ebx           /* copy NRightShift into MM5 */
06065                                 mov edx, Kernel         /* load Kernel address into EDX */
06066                                 mov esi, Src    /* load Src  address to ESI */
06067                                 mov edi, Dest           /* load Dest address to EDI */
06068                                 add edi, 3      /* 3 column offset from the left edge */
06069                                 mov eax, columns        /* load columns into EAX */
06070                                 add edi, eax    /* 3 row offset from the top edge */
06071                                 add edi, eax
06072                                 add edi, eax
06073                                 mov ebx, rows           /* initialize ROWS counter */
06074                                 sub ebx, 6      /* do not use first 3 and last 3 rows */
06075                                 /* ---, */
06076 L10380:
06077                         mov ecx, eax    /* initialize COLUMNS counter */
06078                                 sub ecx, 6      /* do not use first 3 and last 3 columns */
06079                                 align 16                        /* 16 byte alignment of the loop entry */
06080 L10382:
06081                         pxor mm7, mm7           /* zero MM7 (accumulator) */
06082                                 movd mm6, esi           /* save ESI in MM6 */
06083                                 /* --- 1 */
06084                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
06085                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
06086                                 add esi, eax    /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
06087                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06088                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06089                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06090                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06091                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
06092                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
06093                                 psrlw mm1, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06094                                 psrlw mm2, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06095                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
06096                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
06097                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
06098                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
06099                                 /* --- 2 */
06100                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
06101                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
06102                                 add esi, eax    /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
06103                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06104                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06105                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06106                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06107                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
06108                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
06109                                 psrlw mm1, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06110                                 psrlw mm2, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06111                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
06112                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
06113                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
06114                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
06115                                 /* --- 3 */
06116                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
06117                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
06118                                 add esi, eax    /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
06119                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06120                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06121                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06122                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06123                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
06124                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
06125                                 psrlw mm1, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06126                                 psrlw mm2, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06127                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
06128                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
06129                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
06130                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
06131                                 /* --- 4 */
06132                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
06133                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
06134                                 add esi, eax    /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
06135                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06136                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06137                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06138                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06139                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
06140                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
06141                                 psrlw mm1, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06142                                 psrlw mm2, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06143                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
06144                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
06145                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
06146                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
06147                                 /* --- 5 */
06148                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
06149                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
06150                                 add esi, eax    /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
06151                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06152                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06153                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06154                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06155                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
06156                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
06157                                 psrlw mm1, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06158                                 psrlw mm2, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06159                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
06160                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
06161                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
06162                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
06163                                 /* --- 6 */
06164                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
06165                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
06166                                 add esi, eax    /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
06167                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06168                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06169                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06170                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06171                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
06172                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
06173                                 psrlw mm1, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06174                                 psrlw mm2, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06175                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
06176                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
06177                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
06178                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
06179                                 /* --- 7 */
06180                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
06181                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
06182                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06183                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06184                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06185                         punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
06186                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
06187                                 psrlw mm1, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06188                                 psrlw mm2, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06189                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
06190                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
06191                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
06192                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
06193                                 /* ---, */
06194                                 movq mm3, mm7           /* copy MM7 into MM3 */
06195                                 psrlq mm7, 32           /* shift 2 left words to the right */
06196                                 paddsw mm7, mm3         /* add 2 left and 2 right result words */
06197                                 movq mm2, mm7           /* copy MM7 into MM2 */
06198                                 psrlq mm7, 16           /* shift 1 left word to the right */
06199                                 paddsw mm7, mm2         /* add 1 left and 1 right result words */
06200                                 movd mm1, eax           /* save EAX in MM1 */
06201                                 packuswb mm7, mm0       /* pack division result with saturation */
06202                                 movd eax, mm7           /* copy saturated result into EAX */
06203                                 mov [edi], al           /* copy a byte result into Dest */
06204                                 movd eax, mm1           /* restore saved EAX */
06205                                 /* --, */
06206                                 movd esi, mm6           /* move Src pointer to the top pixel */
06207                                 sub edx, 104    /* EDX = Kernel address */
06208                                 inc              esi            /* move Src  pointer to the next pixel */
06209                                 inc              edi            /* move Dest pointer to the next pixel */
06210                                 /* ---, */
06211                                 dec              ecx            /* decrease loop counter COLUMNS */
06212                                 jnz            L10382           /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
06213                                 add esi, 6      /* move to the next row in Src */
06214                                 add edi, 6      /* move to the next row in Dest */
06215                                 dec              ebx            /* decrease loop counter ROWS */
06216                                 jnz            L10380           /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
06217                                 /* ---, */
06218                                 emms                            /* exit MMX state */
06219                                 popa
06220                 }
06221 #else
06222                 asm volatile
06223                         ("pusha              \n\t" "pxor      %%mm0, %%mm0 \n\t"        /* zero MM0 */
06224                         "xor       %%ebx, %%ebx \n\t"   /* zero EBX */
06225                         "mov           %5, %%bl \n\t"   /* load NRightShift into BL */
06226                         "movd      %%ebx, %%mm5 \n\t"   /* copy NRightShift into MM5 */
06227                         "mov          %4, %%edx \n\t"   /* load Kernel address into EDX */
06228                         "mov          %1, %%esi \n\t"   /* load Src  address to ESI */
06229                         "mov          %0, %%edi \n\t"   /* load Dest address to EDI */
06230                         "add          $3, %%edi \n\t"   /* 3 column offset from the left edge */
06231                         "mov          %3, %%eax \n\t"   /* load columns into EAX */
06232                         "add       %%eax, %%edi \n\t"   /* 3 row offset from the top edge */
06233                         "add       %%eax, %%edi \n\t" "add       %%eax, %%edi \n\t" "mov          %2, %%ebx \n\t"       /* initialize ROWS counter */
06234                         "sub          $6, %%ebx \n\t"   /* do not use first 3 and last 3 rows */
06235                         /* --- */
06236                         ".L10380:               \n\t" "mov       %%eax, %%ecx \n\t"     /* initialize COLUMNS counter */
06237                         "sub          $6, %%ecx \n\t"   /* do not use first 3 and last 3 columns */
06238                         ".align 16              \n\t"   /* 16 byte alignment of the loop entry */
06239                         ".L10382:               \n\t" "pxor      %%mm7, %%mm7 \n\t"     /* zero MM7 (accumulator) */
06240                         "movd      %%esi, %%mm6 \n\t"   /* save ESI in MM6 */
06241                         /* --- 1 */
06242                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm1 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
06243                         "movq      %%mm1, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
06244                         "add       %%eax, %%esi \n\t"   /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
06245                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm3 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06246                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06247                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm4 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06248                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06249                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
06250                         "punpckhbw %%mm0, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
06251                         "psrlw     %%mm5, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06252                         "psrlw     %%mm5, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06253                         "pmullw    %%mm3, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
06254                         "pmullw    %%mm4, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
06255                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
06256                         "paddsw    %%mm1, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
06257                         /* --- 2 */
06258                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm1 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
06259                         "movq      %%mm1, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
06260                         "add       %%eax, %%esi \n\t"   /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
06261                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm3 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06262                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06263                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm4 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06264                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06265                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
06266                         "punpckhbw %%mm0, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
06267                         "psrlw     %%mm5, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06268                         "psrlw     %%mm5, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06269                         "pmullw    %%mm3, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
06270                         "pmullw    %%mm4, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
06271                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
06272                         "paddsw    %%mm1, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
06273                         /* --- 3 */
06274                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm1 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
06275                         "movq      %%mm1, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
06276                         "add       %%eax, %%esi \n\t"   /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
06277                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm3 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06278                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06279                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm4 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06280                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06281                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
06282                         "punpckhbw %%mm0, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */

06298                         "punpckhbw %%mm0, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
06299                         "psrlw     %%mm5, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06300                         "psrlw     %%mm5, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */

06302                         "pmullw    %%mm4, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
06303                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
06304                         "paddsw    %%mm1, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
06305                         /* --- 5 */

06307                         "movq      %%mm1, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
06308                         "add       %%eax, %%esi \n\t"   /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
06309                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm3 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */

06311                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm4 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */

06323                         "movq      %%mm1, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
06324                         "add       %%eax, %%esi \n\t"   /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
06325                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm3 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06326                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06327                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm4 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06328                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06329                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
06330                         "punpckhbw %%mm0, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
06331                         "psrlw     %%mm5, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06332                         "psrlw     %%mm5, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06333                         "pmullw    %%mm3, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
06334                         "pmullw    %%mm4, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
06335                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
06336                         "paddsw    %%mm1, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
06337                         /* --- 7 */
06338                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm1 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
06339                         "movq      %%mm1, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
06340                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm3 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06341                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06342                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm4 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06343                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
06344                         "punpckhbw %%mm0, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
06345                         "psrlw     %%mm5, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06346                         "psrlw     %%mm5, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06347                         "pmullw    %%mm3, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
06348                         "pmullw    %%mm4, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
06349                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
06350                         "paddsw    %%mm1, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
06351                         /* --- */
06352                         "movq      %%mm7, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* copy MM7 into MM3 */
06353                         "psrlq       $32, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* shift 2 left words to the right */
06354                         "paddsw    %%mm3, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add 2 left and 2 right result words */
06355                         "movq      %%mm7, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM7 into MM2 */
06356                         "psrlq       $16, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* shift 1 left word to the right */
06357                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add 1 left and 1 right result words */
06358                         "movd      %%eax, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* save EAX in MM1 */
06359                         "packuswb  %%mm0, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* pack division result with saturation */
06360                         "movd      %%mm7, %%eax \n\t"   /* copy saturated result into EAX */
06361                         "mov      %%al, (%%edi) \n\t"   /* copy a byte result into Dest */
06362                         "movd      %%mm1, %%eax \n\t"   /* restore saved EAX */
06363                         /* -- */
06364                         "movd      %%mm6, %%esi \n\t"   /* move Src pointer to the top pixel */
06365                         "sub        $104, %%edx \n\t"   /* EDX = Kernel address */
06366                         "inc              %%esi \n\t"   /* move Src  pointer to the next pixel */
06367                         "inc              %%edi \n\t"   /* move Dest pointer to the next pixel */
06368                         /* --- */
06369                         "dec              %%ecx \n\t"   /* decrease loop counter COLUMNS */
06370                         "jnz            .L10382 \n\t"   /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
06371                         "add          $6, %%esi \n\t"   /* move to the next row in Src */
06372                         "add          $6, %%edi \n\t"   /* move to the next row in Dest */
06373                         "dec              %%ebx \n\t"   /* decrease loop counter ROWS */
06374                         "jnz            .L10380 \n\t"   /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
06375                         /* --- */
06376                         "emms                   \n\t"   /* exit MMX state */
06377                         "popa                   \n\t":"=m" (Dest)       /* %0 */
06378                         :"m"(Src),              /* %1 */
06379                         "m"(rows),              /* %2 */
06380                         "m"(columns),           /* %3 */
06381                         "m"(Kernel),            /* %4 */
06382                         "m"(NRightShift)        /* %5 */
06383                         );
06384 #endif
06385 #endif
06386                 return (0);
06387         } else {
06388                 /* No non-MMX implementation yet */
06389                 return (-1);
06390         }
06391 }
06392 
06407 int SDL_imageFilterConvolveKernel9x9ShiftRight(unsigned char *Src, unsigned char *Dest, int rows, int columns,
06408                                                                                            signed short *Kernel, unsigned char NRightShift)
06409 {
06410         /* Validate input parameters */
06411         if ((Src == NULL) || (Dest == NULL) || (Kernel == NULL))
06412                 return(-1);
06413 
06414         if ((columns < 9) || (rows < 9) || (NRightShift > 7))
06415                 return (-1);
06416 
06417         if ((SDL_imageFilterMMXdetect())) {
06418 #ifdef USE_MMX
06419 #if !defined(GCC__)
06420                 __asm
06421                 {
06422                         pusha
06423                                 pxor mm0, mm0           /* zero MM0 */
06424                                 xor ebx, ebx    /* zero EBX */
06425                                 mov bl, NRightShift     /* load NRightShift into BL */
06426                                 movd mm5, ebx           /* copy NRightShift into MM5 */
06427                                 mov edx, Kernel         /* load Kernel address into EDX */
06428                                 mov esi, Src    /* load Src  address to ESI */
06429                                 mov edi, Dest           /* load Dest address to EDI */
06430                                 add edi, 4      /* 4 column offset from the left edge */
06431                                 mov eax, columns        /* load columns into EAX */
06432                                 add edi, eax    /* 4 row offset from the top edge */
06433                                 add edi, eax
06434                                 add edi, eax
06435                                 add edi, eax
06436                                 mov ebx, rows           /* initialize ROWS counter */
06437                                 sub ebx, 8      /* do not use first 4 and last 4 rows */
06438                                 /* ---, */
06439 L10390:
06440                         mov ecx, eax    /* initialize COLUMNS counter */
06441                                 sub ecx, 8      /* do not use first 4 and last 4 columns */
06442                                 align 16                        /* 16 byte alignment of the loop entry */
06443 L10392:
06444                         pxor mm7, mm7           /* zero MM7 (accumulator) */
06445                                 movd mm6, esi           /* save ESI in MM6 */
06446                                 /* --- 1 */
06447                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
06448                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
06449                                 inc              esi            /* move pointer to the next 8 bytes of Src */
06450                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06451                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06452                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06453                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06454                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
06455                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
06456                                 psrlw mm1, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06457                                 psrlw mm2, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06458                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
06459                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
06460                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
06461                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
06462                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
06463                         dec              esi
06464                                 add esi, eax    /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
06465                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06466                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06467                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
06468                                 psrlw mm1, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06469                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
06470                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
06471                                 /* --- 2 */
06472                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
06473                         movq mm2, mm1           /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
06474                                 inc              esi            /* move pointer to the next 8 bytes of Src */
06475                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06476                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06477                                 movq mm4, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06478                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06479                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
06480                                 punpckhbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
06481                                 psrlw mm1, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06482                                 psrlw mm2, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06483                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
06484                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
06485                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
06486                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
06487                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
06488                         dec              esi
06489                                 add esi, eax    /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
06490                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06491                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06492                                 punpcklbw mm1, mm0      /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
06493                                 psrlw mm1, mm5          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06494                                 pmullw mm1, mm3         /* mult 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */

06609                                 pmullw mm2, mm4         /* mult 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
06610                                 paddsw mm1, mm2         /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
06611                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
06612                                 movq mm1, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
06613                         dec              esi
06614                                 add esi, eax    /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
06615                                 movq mm3, [edx]         /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06616                         add edx, 8      /* move pointer to other 4 words */

06667                                 paddsw mm7, mm1         /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
06668                                 /* ---, */

06691                                 jnz            L10390           /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
