06895                         "psrlw     %%mm5, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06896                         "pmullw    %%mm3, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
06897                         "pmullw    %%mm4, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
06898                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
06899                         "paddsw    %%mm1, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
06900                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm1 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
06901                         "dec              %%esi \n\t" "add       %%eax, %%esi \n\t"     /* move Src pointer 1 row below */
06902                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm3 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06903                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06904                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
06905                         "psrlw     %%mm5, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06906                         "pmullw    %%mm3, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
06907                         "paddsw    %%mm1, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
06908                         /* --- 9 */
06909                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm1 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
06910                         "movq      %%mm1, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM1 into MM2 */
06911                         "inc              %%esi \n\t"   /* move pointer to the next 8 bytes of Src */
06912                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm3 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06913                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06914                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm4 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06915                         "add          $8, %%edx \n\t"   /* move pointer to other 4 words */
06916                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
06917                         "punpckhbw %%mm0, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* unpack second 4 bytes into words */
06918                         "psrlw     %%mm5, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06919                         "psrlw     %%mm5, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06920                         "pmullw    %%mm3, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
06921                         "pmullw    %%mm4, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 high words of Src and Kernel */
06922                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* add 4 words of the high and low bytes */
06923                         "paddsw    %%mm1, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
06924                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm1 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes of the Src */
06925                         "movq    (%%edx), %%mm3 \n\t"   /* load 4 words of Kernel */
06926                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* unpack first  4 bytes into words */
06927                         "psrlw     %%mm5, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
06928                         "pmullw    %%mm3, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* mult. 4 low  words of Src and Kernel */
06929                         "paddsw    %%mm1, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add MM1 to accumulator MM7 */
06930                         /* --- */
06931                         "movq      %%mm7, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* copy MM7 into MM3 */
06932                         "psrlq       $32, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* shift 2 left words to the right */
06933                         "paddsw    %%mm3, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add 2 left and 2 right result words */
06934                         "movq      %%mm7, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM7 into MM2 */
06935                         "psrlq       $16, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* shift 1 left word to the right */
06936                         "paddsw    %%mm2, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add 1 left and 1 right result words */
06937                         "movd      %%eax, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* save EAX in MM1 */
06938                         "packuswb  %%mm0, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* pack division result with saturation */
06939                         "movd      %%mm7, %%eax \n\t"   /* copy saturated result into EAX */
06940                         "mov      %%al, (%%edi) \n\t"   /* copy a byte result into Dest */
06941                         "movd      %%mm1, %%eax \n\t"   /* restore saved EAX */
06942                         /* -- */
06943                         "movd      %%mm6, %%esi \n\t"   /* move Src pointer to the top pixel */
06944                         "sub        $208, %%edx \n\t"   /* EDX = Kernel address */
06945                         "inc              %%esi \n\t"   /* move Src  pointer to the next pixel */
06946                         "inc              %%edi \n\t"   /* move Dest pointer to the next pixel */
06947                         /* --- */
06948                         "dec              %%ecx \n\t"   /* decrease loop counter COLUMNS */
06949                         "jnz            .L10392 \n\t"   /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
06950                         "add          $8, %%esi \n\t"   /* move to the next row in Src */
06951                         "add          $8, %%edi \n\t"   /* move to the next row in Dest */
06952                         "dec              %%ebx \n\t"   /* decrease loop counter ROWS */
06953                         "jnz            .L10390 \n\t"   /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
06954                         /* --- */
06955                         "emms                   \n\t"   /* exit MMX state */
06956                         "popa                   \n\t":"=m" (Dest)       /* %0 */
06957                         :"m"(Src),              /* %1 */
06958                         "m"(rows),              /* %2 */
06959                         "m"(columns),           /* %3 */
06960                         "m"(Kernel),            /* %4 */
06961                         "m"(NRightShift)        /* %5 */
06962                         );
06963 #endif
06964 #endif
06965                 return (0);
06966         } else {
06967                 /* No non-MMX implementation yet */
06968                 return (-1);
06969         }
06970 }
06971 
06972 /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
06973 
06986 int SDL_imageFilterSobelX(unsigned char *Src, unsigned char *Dest, int rows, int columns)
06987 {
06988         /* Validate input parameters */
06989         if ((Src == NULL) || (Dest == NULL))
06990                 return(-1);
06991 
06992         if ((columns < 8) || (rows < 3))
06993                 return (-1);
06994 
06995         if ((SDL_imageFilterMMXdetect())) {
06996 #ifdef USE_MMX
06997 #if !defined(GCC__)
06998                 __asm
06999                 {
07000                         pusha
07001                                 pxor mm0, mm0           /* zero MM0 */
07002                                 mov eax, columns        /* load columns into EAX */
07003                                 /* ---, */
07004                                 mov esi, Src    /* ESI = Src row 0 address */
07005                                 mov edi, Dest           /* load Dest address to EDI */
07006                                 add edi, eax    /* EDI = EDI + columns */
07007                                 inc              edi            /* 1 byte offset from the left edge */
07008                                 mov edx, rows           /* initialize ROWS counter */
07009                                 sub edx, 2      /* do not use first and last rows */
07010                                 /* ---, */
07011 L10400:
07012                         mov ecx, eax    /* initialize COLUMS counter */
07013                                 shr ecx, 3      /* EBX/8 (MMX loads 8 bytes at a time) */
07014                                 mov ebx, esi    /* save ESI in EBX */
07015                                 movd mm1, edi           /* save EDI in MM1 */
07016                                 align 16                        /* 16 byte alignment of the loop entry */
07017 L10402:
07018                         /* ---, */
07019                         movq mm4, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes from Src */
07020                         movq mm5, mm4           /* save MM4 in MM5 */
07021                                 add esi, 2      /* move ESI pointer 2 bytes right */
07022                                 punpcklbw mm4, mm0      /* unpack 4 low  bytes into words */
07023                                 punpckhbw mm5, mm0      /* unpack 4 high bytes into words */
07024                                 movq mm6, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes from Src */
07025                         movq mm7, mm6           /* save MM6 in MM7 */
07026                                 sub esi, 2      /* move ESI pointer back 2 bytes left */
07027                                 punpcklbw mm6, mm0      /* unpack 4 low  bytes into words */
07028                                 punpckhbw mm7, mm0      /* unpack 4 high bytes into words */
07029                                 add esi, eax    /* move to the next row of Src */
07030                                 movq mm2, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes from Src */
07031                         movq mm3, mm2           /* save MM2 in MM3 */
07032                                 add esi, 2      /* move ESI pointer 2 bytes right */
07033                                 punpcklbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack 4 low  bytes into words */
07034                                 punpckhbw mm3, mm0      /* unpack 4 high bytes into words */
07035                                 paddw mm4, mm2          /* add 4 low  bytes to accumolator MM4 */
07036                                 paddw mm5, mm3          /* add 4 high bytes to accumolator MM5 */
07037                                 paddw mm4, mm2          /* add 4 low  bytes to accumolator MM4 */
07038                                 paddw mm5, mm3          /* add 4 high bytes to accumolator MM5 */
07039                                 movq mm2, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes from Src */
07040                         movq mm3, mm2           /* save MM2 in MM3 */
07041                                 sub esi, 2      /* move ESI pointer back 2 bytes left */
07042                                 punpcklbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack 4 low  bytes into words */
07043                                 punpckhbw mm3, mm0      /* unpack 4 high bytes into words */
07044                                 paddw mm6, mm2          /* add 4 low  bytes to accumolator MM6 */
07045                                 paddw mm7, mm3          /* add 4 high bytes to accumolator MM7 */
07046                                 paddw mm6, mm2          /* add 4 low  bytes to accumolator MM6 */
07047                                 paddw mm7, mm3          /* add 4 high bytes to accumolator MM7 */
07048                                 add esi, eax    /* move to the next row of Src */
07049                                 movq mm2, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes from Src */
07050                         movq mm3, mm2           /* save MM2 in MM3 */
07051                                 add esi, 2      /* move ESI pointer 2 bytes right */
07052                                 punpcklbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack 4 low  bytes into words */
07053                                 punpckhbw mm3, mm0      /* unpack 4 high bytes into words */
07054                                 paddw mm4, mm2          /* add 4 low  bytes to accumolator MM4 */
07055                                 paddw mm5, mm3          /* add 4 high bytes to accumolator MM5 */
07056                                 movq mm2, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes from Src */
07057                         movq mm3, mm2           /* save MM2 in MM3 */
07058                                 sub esi, 2      /* move ESI pointer back 2 bytes left */
07059                                 punpcklbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack 4 low  bytes into words */
07060                                 punpckhbw mm3, mm0      /* unpack 4 high bytes into words */
07061                                 paddw mm6, mm2          /* add 4 low  bytes to accumolator MM6 */
07062                                 paddw mm7, mm3          /* add 4 high bytes to accumolator MM7 */
07063                                 /* ---, */
07064                                 movq mm2, mm4           /* copy MM4 into MM2 */
07065                                 psrlq mm4, 32           /* shift 2 left words to the right */
07066                                 psubw mm4, mm2          /* MM4 = MM4 - MM2 */
07067                                 movq mm3, mm6           /* copy MM6 into MM3 */
07068                                 psrlq mm6, 32           /* shift 2 left words to the right */
07069                                 psubw mm6, mm3          /* MM6 = MM6 - MM3 */
07070                                 punpckldq mm4, mm6      /* combine 2 words of MM6 and 2 words of MM4 */
07071                                 movq mm2, mm5           /* copy MM6 into MM2 */
07072                                 psrlq mm5, 32           /* shift 2 left words to the right */
07073                                 psubw mm5, mm2          /* MM5 = MM5 - MM2 */
07074                                 movq mm3, mm7           /* copy MM7 into MM3 */
07075                                 psrlq mm7, 32           /* shift 2 left words to the right */
07076                                 psubw mm7, mm3          /* MM7 = MM7 - MM3 */
07077                                 punpckldq mm5, mm7      /* combine 2 words of MM7 and 2 words of MM5 */
07078                                 /* Take abs values of MM4 and MM5 */
07079                                 movq mm6, mm4           /* copy MM4 into MM6 */
07080                                 movq mm7, mm5           /* copy MM5 into MM7 */
07081                                 psraw mm6, 15           /* fill MM6 words with word sign bit */
07082                                 psraw mm7, 15           /* fill MM7 words with word sign bit */
07083                                 pxor mm4, mm6           /* take 1's compliment of only neg words */
07084                                 pxor mm5, mm7           /* take 1's compliment of only neg words */
07085                                 psubsw mm4, mm6         /* add 1 to only neg words, W-(-1) or W-0 */
07086                                 psubsw mm5, mm7         /* add 1 to only neg words, W-(-1) or W-0 */
07087                                 packuswb mm4, mm5       /* combine and pack/saturate MM5 and MM4 */
07088                                 movq [edi], mm4         /* store result in Dest */
07089                                 /* ---, */
07090                                 sub esi, eax    /* move to the current top row in Src */
07091                                 sub esi, eax
07092                                 add esi, 8      /* move Src  pointer to the next 8 pixels */
07093                                 add edi, 8      /* move Dest pointer to the next 8 pixels */
07094                                 /* ---, */
07095                                 dec              ecx            /* decrease loop counter COLUMNS */
07096                                 jnz            L10402           /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
07097                                 mov esi, ebx    /* restore most left current row Src  address */
07098                                 movd edi, mm1           /* restore most left current row Dest address */
07099                                 add esi, eax    /* move to the next row in Src */
07100                                 add edi, eax    /* move to the next row in Dest */
07101                                 dec              edx            /* decrease loop counter ROWS */
07102                                 jnz            L10400           /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
07103                                 /* ---, */
07104                                 emms                            /* exit MMX state */
07105                                 popa
07106                 }
07107 #else
07108                 asm volatile
07109                         ("pusha              \n\t" "pxor      %%mm0, %%mm0 \n\t"        /* zero MM0 */
07110                         "mov          %3, %%eax \n\t"   /* load columns into EAX */
07111                         /* --- */
07112                         "mov          %1, %%esi \n\t"   /* ESI = Src row 0 address */
07113                         "mov          %0, %%edi \n\t"   /* load Dest address to EDI */
07114                         "add       %%eax, %%edi \n\t"   /* EDI = EDI + columns */
07115                         "inc              %%edi \n\t"   /* 1 byte offset from the left edge */
07116                         "mov          %2, %%edx \n\t"   /* initialize ROWS counter */
07117                         "sub          $2, %%edx \n\t"   /* do not use first and last rows */
07118                         /* --- */
07119                         ".L10400:                \n\t" "mov       %%eax, %%ecx \n\t"    /* initialize COLUMS counter */
07120                         "shr          $3, %%ecx \n\t"   /* EBX/8 (MMX loads 8 bytes at a time) */
07121                         "mov       %%esi, %%ebx \n\t"   /* save ESI in EBX */
07122                         "movd      %%edi, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* save EDI in MM1 */
07123                         ".align 16              \n\t"   /* 16 byte alignment of the loop entry */
07124                         ".L10402:               \n\t"
07125                         /* --- */
07126                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm4 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes from Src */
07127                         "movq      %%mm4, %%mm5 \n\t"   /* save MM4 in MM5 */
07128                         "add          $2, %%esi \n\t"   /* move ESI pointer 2 bytes right */
07129                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm4 \n\t"   /* unpack 4 low  bytes into words */
07130                         "punpckhbw %%mm0, %%mm5 \n\t"   /* unpack 4 high bytes into words */
07131                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm6 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes from Src */
07132                         "movq      %%mm6, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* save MM6 in MM7 */
07133                         "sub          $2, %%esi \n\t"   /* move ESI pointer back 2 bytes left */
07134                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm6 \n\t"   /* unpack 4 low  bytes into words */
07135                         "punpckhbw %%mm0, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* unpack 4 high bytes into words */
07136                         "add       %%eax, %%esi \n\t"   /* move to the next row of Src */
07137                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm2 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes from Src */
07138                         "movq      %%mm2, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* save MM2 in MM3 */
07139                         "add          $2, %%esi \n\t"   /* move ESI pointer 2 bytes right */
07140                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* unpack 4 low  bytes into words */
07141                         "punpckhbw %%mm0, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* unpack 4 high bytes into words */
07142                         "paddw     %%mm2, %%mm4 \n\t"   /* add 4 low  bytes to accumolator MM4 */
07143                         "paddw     %%mm3, %%mm5 \n\t"   /* add 4 high bytes to accumolator MM5 */
07144                         "paddw     %%mm2, %%mm4 \n\t"   /* add 4 low  bytes to accumolator MM4 */
07145                         "paddw     %%mm3, %%mm5 \n\t"   /* add 4 high bytes to accumolator MM5 */
07146                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm2 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes from Src */
07147                         "movq      %%mm2, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* save MM2 in MM3 */
07148                         "sub          $2, %%esi \n\t"   /* move ESI pointer back 2 bytes left */
07149                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* unpack 4 low  bytes into words */
07150                         "punpckhbw %%mm0, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* unpack 4 high bytes into words */
07151                         "paddw     %%mm2, %%mm6 \n\t"   /* add 4 low  bytes to accumolator MM6 */
07152                         "paddw     %%mm3, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add 4 high bytes to accumolator MM7 */
07153                         "paddw     %%mm2, %%mm6 \n\t"   /* add 4 low  bytes to accumolator MM6 */
07154                         "paddw     %%mm3, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add 4 high bytes to accumolator MM7 */
07155                         "add       %%eax, %%esi \n\t"   /* move to the next row of Src */
07156                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm2 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes from Src */
07157                         "movq      %%mm2, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* save MM2 in MM3 */
07158                         "add          $2, %%esi \n\t"   /* move ESI pointer 2 bytes right */
07159                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* unpack 4 low  bytes into words */
07160                         "punpckhbw %%mm0, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* unpack 4 high bytes into words */
07161                         "paddw     %%mm2, %%mm4 \n\t"   /* add 4 low  bytes to accumolator MM4 */
07162                         "paddw     %%mm3, %%mm5 \n\t"   /* add 4 high bytes to accumolator MM5 */
07163                         "movq    (%%esi), %%mm2 \n\t"   /* load 8 bytes from Src */
07164                         "movq      %%mm2, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* save MM2 in MM3 */
07165                         "sub          $2, %%esi \n\t"   /* move ESI pointer back 2 bytes left */
07166                         "punpcklbw %%mm0, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* unpack 4 low  bytes into words */
07167                         "punpckhbw %%mm0, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* unpack 4 high bytes into words */
07168                         "paddw     %%mm2, %%mm6 \n\t"   /* add 4 low  bytes to accumolator MM6 */
07169                         "paddw     %%mm3, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* add 4 high bytes to accumolator MM7 */
07170                         /* --- */
07171                         "movq      %%mm4, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM4 into MM2 */
07172                         "psrlq       $32, %%mm4 \n\t"   /* shift 2 left words to the right */
07173                         "psubw     %%mm2, %%mm4 \n\t"   /* MM4 = MM4 - MM2 */
07174                         "movq      %%mm6, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* copy MM6 into MM3 */
07175                         "psrlq       $32, %%mm6 \n\t"   /* shift 2 left words to the right */
07176                         "psubw     %%mm3, %%mm6 \n\t"   /* MM6 = MM6 - MM3 */
07177                         "punpckldq %%mm6, %%mm4 \n\t"   /* combine 2 words of MM6 and 2 words of MM4 */
07178                         "movq      %%mm5, %%mm2 \n\t"   /* copy MM6 into MM2 */
07179                         "psrlq       $32, %%mm5 \n\t"   /* shift 2 left words to the right */
07180                         "psubw     %%mm2, %%mm5 \n\t"   /* MM5 = MM5 - MM2 */
07181                         "movq      %%mm7, %%mm3 \n\t"   /* copy MM7 into MM3 */
07182                         "psrlq       $32, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* shift 2 left words to the right */
07183                         "psubw     %%mm3, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* MM7 = MM7 - MM3 */
07184                         "punpckldq %%mm7, %%mm5 \n\t"   /* combine 2 words of MM7 and 2 words of MM5 */
07185                         /* Take abs values of MM4 and MM5 */
07186                         "movq      %%mm4, %%mm6 \n\t"   /* copy MM4 into MM6 */
07187                         "movq      %%mm5, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* copy MM5 into MM7 */
07188                         "psraw       $15, %%mm6 \n\t"   /* fill MM6 words with word sign bit */
07189                         "psraw       $15, %%mm7 \n\t"   /* fill MM7 words with word sign bit */
07190                         "pxor      %%mm6, %%mm4 \n\t"   /* take 1's compliment of only neg. words */
07191                         "pxor      %%mm7, %%mm5 \n\t"   /* take 1's compliment of only neg. words */
07192                         "psubsw    %%mm6, %%mm4 \n\t"   /* add 1 to only neg. words, W-(-1) or W-0 */
07193                         "psubsw    %%mm7, %%mm5 \n\t"   /* add 1 to only neg. words, W-(-1) or W-0 */
07194                         "packuswb  %%mm5, %%mm4 \n\t"   /* combine and pack/saturate MM5 and MM4 */
07195                         "movq    %%mm4, (%%edi) \n\t"   /* store result in Dest */
07196                         /* --- */
07197                         "sub       %%eax, %%esi \n\t"   /* move to the current top row in Src */
07198                         "sub       %%eax, %%esi \n\t" "add $8,          %%esi \n\t"     /* move Src  pointer to the next 8 pixels */
07199                         "add $8,          %%edi \n\t"   /* move Dest pointer to the next 8 pixels */
07200                         /* --- */
07201                         "dec              %%ecx \n\t"   /* decrease loop counter COLUMNS */
07202                         "jnz            .L10402 \n\t"   /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
07203                         "mov       %%ebx, %%esi \n\t"   /* restore most left current row Src  address */
07204                         "movd      %%mm1, %%edi \n\t"   /* restore most left current row Dest address */
07205                         "add       %%eax, %%esi \n\t"   /* move to the next row in Src */
07206                         "add       %%eax, %%edi \n\t"   /* move to the next row in Dest */
07207                         "dec              %%edx \n\t"   /* decrease loop counter ROWS */
07208                         "jnz            .L10400 \n\t"   /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
07209                         /* --- */
07210                         "emms                   \n\t"   /* exit MMX state */
07211                         "popa                   \n\t":"=m" (Dest)       /* %0 */
07212                         :"m"(Src),              /* %1 */
07213                         "m"(rows),              /* %2 */
07214                         "m"(columns)            /* %3 */
07215                         );
07216 #endif
07217 #endif
07218                 return (0);
07219         } else {
07220                 /* No non-MMX implementation yet */
07221                 return (-1);
07222         }
07223 }
07224 
07238 int SDL_imageFilterSobelXShiftRight(unsigned char *Src, unsigned char *Dest, int rows, int columns,
07239                                                                         unsigned char NRightShift)
07240 {
07241         /* Validate input parameters */
07242         if ((Src == NULL) || (Dest == NULL))
07243                 return(-1);
07244         if ((columns < 8) || (rows < 3) || (NRightShift > 7))
07245                 return (-1);
07246 
07247         if ((SDL_imageFilterMMXdetect())) {
07248 #ifdef USE_MMX
07249 #if !defined(GCC__)
07250                 __asm
07251                 {
07252                         pusha
07253                                 pxor mm0, mm0           /* zero MM0 */
07254                                 mov eax, columns        /* load columns into EAX */
07255                                 xor ebx, ebx    /* zero EBX */
07256                                 mov bl, NRightShift     /* load NRightShift into BL */
07257                                 movd mm1, ebx           /* copy NRightShift into MM1 */
07258                                 /* ---, */
07259                                 mov esi, Src    /* ESI = Src row 0 address */
07260                                 mov edi, Dest           /* load Dest address to EDI */
07261                                 add edi, eax    /* EDI = EDI + columns */
07262                                 inc              edi            /* 1 byte offset from the left edge */
07263                                 /* initialize ROWS counter */
07264                                 sub rows, 2     /* do not use first and last rows */
07265                                 /* ---, */
07266 L10410:
07267                         mov ecx, eax    /* initialize COLUMS counter */
07268                                 shr ecx, 3      /* EBX/8 (MMX loads 8 bytes at a time) */
07269                                 mov ebx, esi    /* save ESI in EBX */
07270                                 mov edx, edi    /* save EDI in EDX */
07271                                 align 16                        /* 16 byte alignment of the loop entry */
07272 L10412:
07273                         /* ---, */
07274                         movq mm4, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes from Src */
07275                         movq mm5, mm4           /* save MM4 in MM5 */
07276                                 add esi, 2      /* move ESI pointer 2 bytes right */
07277                                 punpcklbw mm4, mm0      /* unpack 4 low  bytes into words */
07278                                 punpckhbw mm5, mm0      /* unpack 4 high bytes into words */
07279                                 psrlw mm4, mm1          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
07280                                 psrlw mm5, mm1          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
07281                                 movq mm6, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes from Src */
07282                         movq mm7, mm6           /* save MM6 in MM7 */
07283                                 sub esi, 2      /* move ESI pointer back 2 bytes left */
07284                                 punpcklbw mm6, mm0      /* unpack 4 low  bytes into words */
07285                                 punpckhbw mm7, mm0      /* unpack 4 high bytes into words */
07286                                 psrlw mm6, mm1          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
07287                                 psrlw mm7, mm1          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */

07289                                 movq mm2, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes from Src */
07290                         movq mm3, mm2           /* save MM2 in MM3 */
07291                                 add esi, 2      /* move ESI pointer 2 bytes right */
07292                                 punpcklbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack 4 low  bytes into words */
07293                                 punpckhbw mm3, mm0      /* unpack 4 high bytes into words */
07294                                 psrlw mm2, mm1          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
07295                                 psrlw mm3, mm1          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
07296                                 paddw mm4, mm2          /* add 4 low  bytes to accumolator MM4 */
07297                                 paddw mm5, mm3          /* add 4 high bytes to accumolator MM5 */
07298                                 paddw mm4, mm2          /* add 4 low  bytes to accumolator MM4 */
07299                                 paddw mm5, mm3          /* add 4 high bytes to accumolator MM5 */
07300                                 movq mm2, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes from Src */
07301                         movq mm3, mm2           /* save MM2 in MM3 */
07302                                 sub esi, 2      /* move ESI pointer back 2 bytes left */

07304                                 punpckhbw mm3, mm0      /* unpack 4 high bytes into words */
07305                                 psrlw mm2, mm1          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
07306                                 psrlw mm3, mm1          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */

07308                                 paddw mm7, mm3          /* add 4 high bytes to accumolator MM7 */
07309                                 paddw mm6, mm2          /* add 4 low  bytes to accumolator MM6 */
07310                                 paddw mm7, mm3          /* add 4 high bytes to accumolator MM7 */
07311                                 add esi, eax    /* move to the next row of Src */
07312                                 movq mm2, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes from Src */
07313                         movq mm3, mm2           /* save MM2 in MM3 */

07315                                 punpcklbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack 4 low  bytes into words */
07316                                 punpckhbw mm3, mm0      /* unpack 4 high bytes into words */
07317                                 psrlw mm2, mm1          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
07318                                 psrlw mm3, mm1          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
07319                                 paddw mm4, mm2          /* add 4 low  bytes to accumolator MM4 */
07320                                 paddw mm5, mm3          /* add 4 high bytes to accumolator MM5 */
07321                                 movq mm2, [esi]         /* load 8 bytes from Src */
07322                         movq mm3, mm2           /* save MM2 in MM3 */
07323                                 sub esi, 2      /* move ESI pointer back 2 bytes left */
07324                                 punpcklbw mm2, mm0      /* unpack 4 low  bytes into words */
07325                                 punpckhbw mm3, mm0      /* unpack 4 high bytes into words */
07326                                 psrlw mm2, mm1          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
07327                                 psrlw mm3, mm1          /* shift right each pixel NshiftRight times */
07328                                 paddw mm6, mm2          /* add 4 low  bytes to accumolator MM6 */
07329                                 paddw mm7, mm3          /* add 4 high bytes to accumolator MM7 */
07330                                 /* ---, */
07331                                 movq mm2, mm4           /* copy MM4 into MM2 */
07332                                 psrlq mm4, 32           /* shift 2 left words to the right */
07333                                 psubw mm4, mm2          /* MM4 = MM4 - MM2 */
07334                                 movq mm3, mm6           /* copy MM6 into MM3 */
07335                                 psrlq mm6, 32           /* shift 2 left words to the right */
07336                                 psubw mm6, mm3          /* MM6 = MM6 - MM3 */
07337                                 punpckldq mm4, mm6      /* combine 2 words of MM6 and 2 words of MM4 */
07338                                 movq mm2, mm5           /* copy MM6 into MM2 */
07339                                 psrlq mm5, 32           /* shift 2 left words to the right */
07340                                 psubw mm5, mm2          /* MM5 = MM5 - MM2 */
07341                                 movq mm3, mm7           /* copy MM7 into MM3 */
07342                                 psrlq mm7, 32           /* shift 2 left words to the right */
07343                                 psubw mm7, mm3          /* MM7 = MM7 - MM3 */
07344                                 punpckldq mm5, mm7      /* combine 2 words of MM7 and 2 words of MM5 */
07345                                 /* Take abs values of MM4 and MM5 */
07346                                 movq mm6, mm4           /* copy MM4 into MM6 */
07347                                 movq mm7, mm5           /* copy MM5 into MM7 */
07348                                 psraw mm6, 15           /* fill MM6 words with word sign bit */
07349                                 psraw mm7, 15           /* fill MM7 words with word sign bit */
07350                                 pxor mm4, mm6           /* take 1's compliment of only neg words */
07351                                 pxor mm5, mm7           /* take 1's compliment of only neg words */
07352                                 psubsw mm4, mm6         /* add 1 to only neg words, W-(-1) or W-0 */
07353                                 psubsw mm5, mm7         /* add 1 to only neg words, W-(-1) or W-0 */
07354                                 packuswb mm4, mm5       /* combine and pack/saturate MM5 and MM4 */
07355                                 movq [edi], mm4         /* store result in Dest */
07356                                 /* ---, */
07357                                 sub esi, eax    /* move to the current top row in Src */
07358                                 sub esi, eax
07359                                 add esi, 8      /* move Src  pointer to the next 8 pixels */
07360                                 add edi, 8      /* move Dest pointer to the next 8 pixels */
07361                                 /* ---, */

07363                                 jnz            L10412           /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
07364                                 mov esi, ebx    /* restore most left current row Src  address */
07365                                 mov edi, edx    /* restore most left current row Dest address */

07367                                 add edi, eax    /* move to the next row in Dest */

07369                                 jnz            L10410           /* check loop termination, proceed if required */
07370                                 /* ---, */
07371                                 emms                            /* exit MMX state */
07372                                 popa
07373                 }

07376                         ("pusha              \n\t" "pxor      %%mm0, %%mm0 \n\t"        /* zero MM0 */

07378                         "xor       %%ebx, %%ebx \n\t"   /* zero EBX */
07379                         "mov           %4, %%bl \n\t"   /* load NRightShift into BL */
07380                         "movd      %%ebx, %%mm1 \n\t"   /* copy NRightShift into MM1 */
07381                         /* --- */

07383                         "mov          %0, %%edi \n\t"   /* load Dest address to EDI */

07511 void SDL_imageFilterAlignStack(void)
07512 {
07513 #ifdef USE_MMX
07514 #if !defined(GCC__)
07515         __asm
07516         {                               /* --- stack alignment --- */
07517                 mov ebx, esp    /* load ESP into EBX */
07518                         sub ebx, 4      /* reserve space on stack for old value of ESP */
07519                         and ebx, -32    /* align EBX along a 32 byte boundary */
07520                         mov [ebx], esp          /* save old value of ESP in stack, behind the bndry */
07521                         mov esp, ebx    /* align ESP along a 32 byte boundary */
07522         }
07523 #else
07524         asm volatile
07525                 (                               /* --- stack alignment --- */
07526                 "mov       %%esp, %%ebx \n\t"   /* load ESP into EBX */
07527                 "sub          $4, %%ebx \n\t"   /* reserve space on stack for old value of ESP */
07528                 "and        $-32, %%ebx \n\t"   /* align EBX along a 32 byte boundary */
07529                 "mov     %%esp, (%%ebx) \n\t"   /* save old value of ESP in stack, behind the bndry */
07530                 "mov       %%ebx, %%esp \n\t"   /* align ESP along a 32 byte boundary */
07531                 ::);
07532 #endif
07533 #endif
07534 }

07539 void SDL_imageFilterRestoreStack(void)
07540 {
07541 #ifdef USE_MMX
07542 #if !defined(GCC__)
07543         __asm
07544         {                               /* --- restoring old stack --- */
07545                 mov ebx, [esp]          /* load old value of ESP */
07546                 mov esp, ebx    /* restore old value of ESP */
07547         }
07548 #else
07549         asm volatile
07550                 (                               /* --- restoring old stack --- */
07551                 "mov     (%%esp), %%ebx \n\t"   /* load old value of ESP */
07552                 "mov       %%ebx, %%esp \n\t"   /* restore old value of ESP */
07553                 ::);
07554 #endif
07555 #endif
07556 }
